(Bonus) Shows Leaderboard for gamification. # EduMorph â€” Prototype (Full Code + Setup) **Goal:** Complete, runnable prototype for the hackathon: OCR of handwritten notes â†’ AI summary â†’ generated quiz â†’ mood-adaptive difficulty â†’ dashboard + leaderboard. This repo is designed to be demo-ready and production-looking. --- ## What is included * Backend (Node.js + Express + Prisma + SQLite) * Frontend (React + Vite + Tailwind CSS + Recharts) * OCR: Tesseract.js (server-side or client-side option) * AI: OpenAI (prompt templates included) * Database schema (Prisma) * README with run & deploy instructions --- > NOTE: This document includes core files required to run a working prototype. Save them into a single project directory `edumorph-prototype` with `client/` and `server/` subfolders. --- ## Root README (create `README.md`) ```markdown # EduMorph Prototype ## Overview EduMorph is a prototype app that converts handwritten notes into an AI summary and an adaptive quiz. It features a professional dashboard (EduMorph Dashboard), NoteScan page to upload notes, Smart Quiz, Learning Progress graphs and a Leaderboard. ## Quickstart (dev) ### Prereqs - Node.js 18+ - npm or yarn - (Optional) OpenAI API key ### Install 1. Clone repo or create folders `client/` and `server/`. 2. Setup backend (server directory) and frontend (client directory) as below. ### Environment Create `.env` in `server/`: ``` OPENAI\_KEY=sk-... (your OpenAI API key) PORT=5000 DATABASE\_URL="file:./dev.db" JWT\_SECRET=changeme ``` ### Run Open two terminals: **Backend** ``` cd server npm install npx prisma migrate dev --name init npm run dev ``` **Frontend** ``` cd client npm install npm run dev ``` App will run at `http://localhost:5173` (Vite default). Backend: `http://localhost:5000`. ## Demo flow 1. Login using demo account. 2. Upload handwritten note image in NoteScan. 3. Wait for OCR + AI â†’ view summary and generate quiz. 4. Take quiz â†’ view Learning Progress and Leaderboard. --- ``` --- ## Server: `server/package.json` ```json { "name": "edumorph-server", "version": "1.0.0", "type": "module", "scripts": { "dev": "nodemon src/index.js", "start": "node src/index.js", "prisma": "prisma" }, "dependencies": { "cors": "^2.8.5", "dotenv": "^16.0.0", "express": "^4.18.2", "openai": "^4.0.0", "prisma": "^4.0.0", "@prisma/client": "^4.0.0", "tesseract.js": "^4.0.2", "multer": "^1.4.5" }, "devDependencies": { "nodemon": "^2.0.20" } } ``` --- ## Server: `server/prisma/schema.prisma` ```prisma datasource db { provider = "sqlite" url = env("DATABASE_URL") } generator client { provider = "prisma-client-js" } model User { id String @id @default(cuid()) name String? email String? @unique mood String? // happy|neutral|sad createdAt DateTime @default(now()) attempts Attempt[] } model Document { id String @id @default(cuid()) title String? text String summary String? topics String? // optional JSON or comma list createdAt DateTime @default(now()) quizzes Quiz[] } model Quiz { id String @id @default(cuid()) documentId String title String items Json createdAt DateTime @default(now()) attempts Attempt[] document Document @relation(fields: [documentId], references: [id]) } model Attempt { id String @id @default(cuid()) userId String quizId String score Float createdAt DateTime @default(now()) user User @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id]) quiz Quiz @relation(fields: [quizId], references: [id]) } ``` --- ## Server core: `server/src/index.js` ```js import express from "express"; import cors from "cors"; import dotenv from "dotenv"; import { PrismaClient } from "@prisma/client"; import multer from "multer"; import fs from "fs"; import path from "path"; import Tesseract from "tesseract.js"; import OpenAI from "openai"; dotenv.config(); const prisma = new PrismaClient(); const app = express(); app.use(cors()); app.use(express.json({ limit: '5mb' })); const openai = new OpenAI({ apiKey: process.env.OPENAI_KEY }); // file upload config const upload = multer({ dest: 'uploads/' }); // Demo: create or get demo user app.post('/auth/demo', async (req, res) => { const { name } = req.body; let user = await prisma.user.findFirst({ where: { name } }); if (!user) user = await prisma.user.create({ data: { name } }); res.json(user); }); // Upload note image -> OCR -> AI process app.post('/notes/upload', upload.single('image'), async (req, res) => { try { const filepath = req.file.path; // run tesseract const { data } = await Tesseract.recognize(filepath, 'eng', { logger: m => console.log(m) }); const text = data.text; // call OpenAI to get summary and questions const prompt = `You are an educational assistant. Summarize the following text in 3-4 sentences, list key topics (3-8) and generate 5 quiz questions (mix MCQ and TF) with answer keys. Return JSON with keys: summary, topics, questions (array). Text:\n\n${text}`; const response = await openai.chat.completions.create({ model: 'gpt-4o-mini', messages: [{ role: 'user', content: prompt }], temperature: 0.2, max_tokens: 900 }); let aiOutput = response.choices[0].message.content; // Try to parse JSON (AI should return JSON). If not, wrap it. let parsed; try { parsed = JSON.parse(aiOutput); } catch (e) { // fallback: put AI raw as summary parsed = { summary: aiOutput, topics: [], questions: [] }; } const doc = await prisma.document.create({ data: { text, summary: parsed.summary || '', topics: JSON.stringify(parsed.topics || [] ) } }); // create quiz const qItems = parsed.questions || []; const quiz = await prisma.quiz.create({ data: { documentId: doc.id, title: (req.body.title || 'Auto Quiz'), items: qItems } }); // cleanup file fs.unlinkSync(filepath); res.json({ doc, quiz }); } catch (err) { console.error(err); res.status(500).json({ error: 'processing failed', details: String(err) }); } }); // get quiz app.get('/quiz/:quizId', async (req, res) => { const quiz = await prisma.quiz.findUnique({ where: { id: req.params.quizId } }); res.json(quiz); }); // submit quiz app.post('/quiz/:quizId/submit', async (req, res) => { const { userId, answers } = req.body; // answers: { questionIndex: answerIndex or value } const quiz = await prisma.quiz.findUnique({ where: { id: req.params.quizId } }); const items = quiz.items; let correct = 0; items.forEach((q, i) => { if (q.type === 'mcq') { if (answers[i] === q.answer) correct++; } else if (q.type === 'tf') { if ((answers[i] === true && q.answer === true) || (answers[i] === false && q.answer === false)) correct++; } }); const score = (correct / items.length) * 100; const attempt = await prisma.attempt.create({ data: { userId, quizId: quiz.id, score } }); res.json({ attempt, score }); }); // stats & leaderboard app.get('/stats/:userId', async (req, res) => { const userId = req.params.userId; const attempts = await prisma.attempt.findMany({ where: { userId }, orderBy: { createdAt: 'asc' } }); res.json({ attempts }); }); app.get('/leaderboard', async (req, res) => { // top users by avg score const result = await prisma.$queryRaw`SELECT u.id, u.name, AVG(a.score) as avgScore FROM User u JOIN Attempt a ON u.id = a.userId GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY avgScore DESC LIMIT 10`; res.json(result); }); const PORT = process.env.PORT || 5000; app.listen(PORT, () => console.log(`Server running on ${PORT}`)); ``` --- ## Client: `client/package.json` ```json { "name": "edumorph-client", "version": "1.0.0", "private": true, "scripts": { "dev": "vite", "build": "vite build", "preview": "vite preview" }, "dependencies": { "axios": "^1.4.0", "react": "^18.2.0", "react-dom": "^18.2.0", "recharts": "^2.3.2" }, "devDependencies": { "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.0.0", "tailwindcss": "^3.4.0", "vite": "^5.0.0" } } ``` --- ## Client: Tailwind & Vite setup (quick summary) * `tailwind.config.cjs` and `postcss.config.cjs` standard setup. * Add Tailwind classes to components. --- ## Client main files ### `client/src/main.jsx` ```jsx import React from 'react' import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client' import App from './App' import './index.css' createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(<App />) ``` ### `client/src/App.jsx` > This is the landing dashboard-enforced layout inspired by your screenshot. prisma/schema.prisma datasource db { provider = "sqlite" url = "file:./dev.db" }

generator client { provider = "prisma-client-js" }

model User { id String @id @default(cuid()) email String @unique name String? mood String? // happy, neutral, sad attempts Attempt[] }

model Document { id String @id @default(cuid()) text String summary String? createdAt DateTime @default(now()) quizzes Quiz[] }

model Quiz { id String @id @default(cuid()) documentId String title String items Json attempts Attempt[] document Document @relation(fields:[documentId], references:[id]) }

model Attempt { id String @id @default(cuid()) userId String quizId String score Float user User @relation(fields:[userId], references:[id]) quiz Quiz @relation(fields:[quizId], references:[id]) }

Run migrations:

npx prisma migrate dev --name init

index.js (simplified) import express from "express"; import cors from "cors"; import bodyParser from "body-parser"; import { PrismaClient } from "@prisma/client"; import Tesseract from "tesseract.js"; import OpenAI from "openai";

const prisma = new PrismaClient(); const app = express(); app.use(cors()); app.use(bodyParser.json());

const openai = new OpenAI({ apiKey: process.env.OPENAI_KEY });

// Upload image â†’ OCR â†’ summary + quiz app.post("/upload", async (req, res) => { const { imageBase64 } = req.body; const ocr = await Tesseract.recognize(Buffer.from(imageBase64, "base64"), "eng"); const extractedText = ocr.data.text;

// Generate summary + quiz const prompt = Summarize this text in 3 lines and create 5 quiz questions (JSON): ${extractedText} ; const aiResp = await openai.chat.completions.create({ model: "gpt-4o-mini", messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }], temperature: 0.2 }); const output = aiResp.choices[0].message.content;

const doc = await prisma.document.create({ data: { text: extractedText, summary: output } });

res.json(doc); });

// Fetch quiz app.get("/quiz/:docId", async (req, res) => { const quiz = await prisma.quiz.findFirst({ where: { documentId: req.params.docId } }); res.json(quiz); });

// Submit quiz attempt app.post("/quiz/:quizId/submit", async (req, res) => { const { userId, answers } = req.body; const quiz = await prisma.quiz.findUnique({ where: { id: req.params.quizId } }); let score = 0; quiz.items.forEach((q, i) => { if (answers[i] === q.answer) score++; }); const attempt = await prisma.attempt.create({ data: { userId, quizId: quiz.id, score } }); res.json(attempt); });

app.listen(5000, () => console.log("Server running on http://localhost:5000"));

Root README (create README.md)

# EduMorph Prototype

## Overview
EduMorph is a prototype app that converts handwritten notes into an AI summary and an adaptive quiz. It features a professional dashboard (EduMorph Dashboard), NoteScan page to upload notes, Smart Quiz, Learning Progress graphs and a Leaderboard.

## Quickstart (dev)

### Prereqs
- Node.js 18+
- npm or yarn
- (Optional) OpenAI API key

### Install
1. Clone repo or create folders `client/` and `server/`.
2. Setup backend (server directory) and frontend (client directory) as below.

### Environment
Create `.env` in `server/`:

OPENAI_KEY=sk-... (your OpenAI API key) PORT=5000 DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" JWT_SECRET=changeme


### Run
Open two terminals:

**Backend**

cd server npm install npx prisma migrate dev --name init npm run dev


**Frontend**

cd client npm install npm run dev


App will run at `http://localhost:5173` (Vite default). Backend: `http://localhost:5000`.

## Demo flow
1. Login using demo account.
2. Upload handwritten note image in NoteScan.
3. Wait for OCR + AI â†’ view summary and generate quiz.
4. Take quiz â†’ view Learning Progress and Leaderboard.

Server: server/prisma/schema.prisma

datasource db {
  provider = "sqlite"
  url      = env("DATABASE_URL")
}

generator client {
  provider = "prisma-client-js"
}

model User {
  id      String    @id @default(cuid())
  name    String?
  email   String?   @unique
  mood    String?   // happy|neutral|sad
  createdAt DateTime @default(now())
  attempts Attempt[]
}

model Document {
  id        String   @id @default(cuid())
  title     String?
  text      String
  summary   String?
  topics    String?  // optional JSON or comma list
  createdAt DateTime @default(now())
  quizzes   Quiz[]
}

model Quiz {
  id         String  @id @default(cuid())
  documentId String
  title      String
  items      Json
  createdAt  DateTime @default(now())
  attempts   Attempt[]
  document   Document @relation(fields: [documentId], references: [id])
}

model Attempt {
  id       String  @id @default(cuid())
  userId   String
  quizId   String
  score    Float
  createdAt DateTime @default(now())
  user     User   @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id])
  quiz     Quiz   @relation(fields: [quizId], references: [id])
}

Server core: server/src/index.js

import express from "express";
import cors from "cors";
import dotenv from "dotenv";
import { PrismaClient } from "@prisma/client";
import multer from "multer";
import fs from "fs";
import path from "path";
import Tesseract from "tesseract.js";
import OpenAI from "openai";

dotenv.config();
const prisma = new PrismaClient();
const app = express();
app.use(cors());
app.use(express.json({ limit: '5mb' }));

const openai = new OpenAI({ apiKey: process.env.OPENAI_KEY });

// file upload config
const upload = multer({ dest: 'uploads/' });

// Demo: create or get demo user
app.post('/auth/demo', async (req, res) => {
  const { name } = req.body;
  let user = await prisma.user.findFirst({ where: { name } });
  if (!user) user = await prisma.user.create({ data: { name } });
  res.json(user);
});

// Upload note image -> OCR -> AI process
app.post('/notes/upload', upload.single('image'), async (req, res) => {
  try {
    const filepath = req.file.path;
    // run tesseract
    const { data } = await Tesseract.recognize(filepath, 'eng', { logger: m => console.log(m) });
    const text = data.text;

    // call OpenAI to get summary and questions
    const prompt = `You are an educational assistant. Summarize the following text in 3-4 sentences, list key topics (3-8) and generate 5 quiz questions (mix MCQ and TF) with answer keys. Return JSON with keys: summary, topics, questions (array). Text:\n\n${text}`;

    const response = await openai.chat.completions.create({
      model: 'gpt-4o-mini',
      messages: [{ role: 'user', content: prompt }],
      temperature: 0.2,
      max_tokens: 900
    });

    let aiOutput = response.choices[0].message.content;

    // Try to parse JSON (AI should return JSON). If not, wrap it.
    let parsed;
    try { parsed = JSON.parse(aiOutput); } catch (e) {
      // fallback: put AI raw as summary
      parsed = { summary: aiOutput, topics: [], questions: [] };
    }

    const doc = await prisma.document.create({ data: { text, summary: parsed.summary || '', topics: JSON.stringify(parsed.topics || [] ) } });

    // create quiz
    const qItems = parsed.questions || [];
    const quiz = await prisma.quiz.create({ data: { documentId: doc.id, title: (req.body.title || 'Auto Quiz'), items: qItems } });

    // cleanup file
    fs.unlinkSync(filepath);

    res.json({ doc, quiz });
  } catch (err) {
    console.error(err);
    res.status(500).json({ error: 'processing failed', details: String(err) });
  }
});

// get quiz
app.get('/quiz/:quizId', async (req, res) => {
  const quiz = await prisma.quiz.findUnique({ where: { id: req.params.quizId } });
  res.json(quiz);
});

// submit quiz
app.post('/quiz/:quizId/submit', async (req, res) => {
  const { userId, answers } = req.body; // answers: { questionIndex: answerIndex or value }
  const quiz = await prisma.quiz.findUnique({ where: { id: req.params.quizId } });
  const items = quiz.items;
  let correct = 0;
  items.forEach((q, i) => {
    if (q.type === 'mcq') {
      if (answers[i] === q.answer) correct++;
    } else if (q.type === 'tf') {
      if ((answers[i] === true && q.answer === true) || (answers[i] === false && q.answer === false)) correct++;
    }
  });
  const score = (correct / items.length) * 100;
  const attempt = await prisma.attempt.create({ data: { userId, quizId: quiz.id, score } });
  res.json({ attempt, score });
});

// stats & leaderboard
app.get('/stats/:userId', async (req, res) => {
  const userId = req.params.userId;
  const attempts = await prisma.attempt.findMany({ where: { userId }, orderBy: { createdAt: 'asc' } });
  res.json({ attempts });
});

app.get('/leaderboard', async (req, res) => {
  // top users by avg score
  const result = await prisma.$queryRaw`SELECT u.id, u.name, AVG(a.score) as avgScore FROM User u JOIN Attempt a ON u.id = a.userId GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY avgScore DESC LIMIT 10`;
  res.json(result);
});

const PORT = process.env.PORT || 5000;
app.listen(PORT, () => console.log(`Server running on ${PORT}`));

import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
import axios from 'axios'
import Dashboard from './pages/Dashboard'
import NoteScan from './pages/NoteScan'
import QuizPage from './pages/QuizPage'
import Progress from './pages/Progress'
import Leaderboard from './pages/Leaderboard'

export default function App(){
  const [route, setRoute] = useState('dashboard');
  const [user, setUser] = useState(null);

  useEffect(()=>{
    // demo auto-login
    (async ()=>{
      const resp = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/auth/demo', { name: 'K.Siddhartha' });
      setUser(resp.data);
    })()
  },[])

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen flex bg-slate-50">
      <aside className="w-64 bg-white shadow">
        <div className="p-6 border-b">
          <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold">EduMorph</h2>
        </div>
        <nav className="p-4">
          {['dashboard','notescan','quiz','progress','leaderboard','profile'].map(r=> (
            <button key={r} onClick={()=> setRoute(r)} className={`block w-full text-left p-3 rounded mb-1 ${route===r? 'bg-indigo-50':'hover:bg-gray-100'}`}>{r=== 'notescan' ? 'NoteScan' : r.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+r.slice(1)}</button>
          ))}
        </nav>
      </aside>

      <main className="flex-1 p-6">
        {route==='dashboard' && <Dashboard user={user} />}
        {route==='notescan' && <NoteScan user={user} />}
        {route==='quiz' && <QuizPage user={user} />}
        {route==='progress' && <Progress user={user} />}
        {route==='leaderboard' && <Leaderboard />}
      </main>
    </div>
  )
}

client/src/pages/NoteScan.jsx

import React, { useState } from 'react'
import axios from 'axios'

export default function NoteScan({ user }){
  const [file, setFile] = useState(null);
  const [summary, setSummary] = useState(null);
  const [quiz, setQuiz] = useState(null);

  const upload = async ()=>{
    if(!file) return alert('select image');
    const form = new FormData();
    form.append('image', file);
    form.append('title', file.name);
    const resp = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/notes/upload', form, { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' } });
    setSummary(resp.data.doc.summary);
    setQuiz(resp.data.quiz);
  }

  return (
    <div>
      <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded shadow mb-4">
        <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold">Upload Your Handwritten Notes</h2>
        <input type="file" accept="image/*" onChange={(e)=> setFile(e.target.files[0])} className="mt-3" />
        <button onClick={upload} className="mt-3 bg-indigo-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">Process & Generate Quiz</button>
      </div>

      {summary && (
        <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded shadow">
          <h3 className="font-semibold">AI Summary</h3>
          <p>{summary}</p>
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  )
}

client/src/pages/QuizPage.jsx

import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
import axios from 'axios'

export default function QuizPage({ user }){
  const [quiz, setQuiz] = useState(null);
  const [answers, setAnswers] = useState({});
  const [score, setScore] = useState(null);

  useEffect(()=>{
    // for demo: fetch latest quiz
    // replace with real quiz id selection
    (async ()=>{
      const resp = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/quiz');
    })()
  },[])

  if(!quiz) return <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded shadow">No quiz selected yet. Use NoteScan to create a quiz.</div>

  const submit = async ()=>{
    const resp = await axios.post(`http://localhost:5000/quiz/${quiz.id}/submit`, { userId: user.id, answers });
    setScore(resp.data.score);
  }

  return (
    <div>
      <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Take Your Quiz</h2>
      {quiz.items.map((q, idx)=> (
        <div key={idx} className="bg-white p-4 rounded shadow mb-3">
          <p>{idx+1}. {q.question}</p>
          {q.type === 'mcq' && q.options.map((opt,i)=> (
            <label key={i} className="block"><input type="radio" name={`q${idx}`} onChange={()=> setAnswers({...answers, [idx]:i})} /> {opt}</label>
          ))}
          {q.type === 'tf' && (
            <div>
              <label><input type="radio" name={`q${idx}`} onChange={()=> setAnswers({...answers, [idx]: true})} /> True</label>
              <label><input type="radio" name={`q${idx}`} onChange={()=> setAnswers({...answers, [idx]: false})} /> False</label>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      ))}
      <button onClick={submit} className="bg-indigo-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded">Submit</button>
      {score !== null && <div className="mt-3">Score: {score}%</div>}
    </div>
  )
}

client/src/pages/Progress.jsx

import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
import axios from 'axios'
import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts'

export default function Progress({ user }){
  const [attempts, setAttempts] = useState([]);

  useEffect(()=>{
    (async ()=>{
      const resp = await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/stats/${user.id}`);
      setAttempts(resp.data.attempts.map((a,i)=> ({ attempt: i+1, score: Math.round(a.score) })));
    })()
  },[])

  if(attempts.length===0) return <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded shadow">No attempts yet.</div>

  const latest = attempts[attempts.length-1].score;

  return (
    <div>
      <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded shadow mb-4">
        <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold">Track Your Growth</h2>
      </div>

      <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded shadow">
        <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={250}>
          <LineChart data={attempts}><XAxis dataKey="attempt"/><YAxis/><Tooltip/><Line type="monotone" dataKey="score" stroke="#4f46e5" /></LineChart>
        </ResponsiveContainer>
      </div>

      <div className="mt-4 bg-white p-4 rounded shadow">
        <h3>Latest Attempt</h3>
        <PieChart width={200} height={200}><Pie data={[{ name: 'score', value: latest }, { name: 'rest', value: 100-latest }]} dataKey="value" innerRadius={40} outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" label><Cell fill="#22c55e"/><Cell fill="#ef4444"/></Pie></PieChart>
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}

client/src/pages/Leaderboard.jsx

import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
import axios from 'axios'

export default function Leaderboard(){
  const [rows, setRows] = useState([]);
  useEffect(()=>{ (async ()=>{ const resp = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/leaderboard'); setRows(resp.data); })() },[])

  return (
    <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded shadow">
      <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">Top EduMorph Learners</h2>
      <table className="w-full">
        <thead><tr><th>Rank</th><th>Name</th><th>Avg Score</th></tr></thead>
        <tbody>
          {rows.map((r,i)=> (
            <tr key={i}><td>{i+1}</td><td>{r.name || 'Anon'}</td><td>{Math.round(r.avgScore)}</td></tr>
          ))}
        </tbody>
      </table>
    </div>
  )
}

from "react-hook-form" import { cn } from "@/lib/utils" import { Label } from "@/components/ui/label" const Form = FormProvider type FormFieldContextValue< TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues, TName extends FieldPath<TFieldValues> = FieldPath<TFieldValues> > = { name: TName } const FormFieldContext = React.createContext<FormFieldContextValue>( {} as FormFieldContextValue ) const FormField = < TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues, TName extends FieldPath<TFieldValues> = FieldPath<TFieldValues> >({ ...props }: ControllerProps<TFieldValues, TName>) => { return ( <FormFieldContext.Provider value={{ name: props.name }}> <Controller {...props} /> </FormFieldContext.Provider> ) } const useFormField = () => { const fieldContext = React.useContext(FormFieldContext) const itemContext = React.useContext(FormItemContext) const { getFieldState, formState } = useFormContext() const fieldState = getFieldState(fieldContext.name, formState) if (!fieldContext) { throw new Error("useFormField should be used within <FormField>") } const { id } = itemContext return { id, name: fieldContext.name, formItemId: `${id}-form-item`, formDescriptionId: `${id}-form-item-description`, formMessageId: `${id}-form-item-message`, ...fieldState, } } type FormItemContextValue = { id: string } const FormItemContext = React.createContext<FormItemContextValue>( {} as FormItemContextValue ) const FormItem = React.forwardRef< HTMLDivElement, React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement> >(({ className, ...props }, ref) => { const id = React.useId() return ( <FormItemContext.Provider value={{ id }}> <div ref={ref} className={cn("space-y-2", className)} {...props} /> </FormItemContext.Provider> ) }) FormItem.displayName = "FormItem" const FormLabel = React.forwardRef< React.ElementRef<typeof LabelPrimitive.Root>, React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof LabelPrimitive.Root> >(({ className, ...props }, ref) => { const { error, formItemId } = useFormField() return ( <Label ref={ref} className={cn(error && "text-destructive", className)} htmlFor={formItemId} {...props} /> ) }) FormLabel.displayName = "FormLabel" const FormControl = React.forwardRef< React.ElementRef<typeof Slot>, React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof Slot> >(({ ...props }, ref) => { const { error, formItemId, formDescriptionId, formMessageId } = useFormField() return ( <Slot ref={ref} id={formItemId} aria-describedby={ !error ? `${formDescriptionId}` : `${formDescriptionId} ${formMessageId}` } aria-invalid={!!error} {...props} /> ) }) FormControl.displayName = "FormControl" const FormDescription = React.forwardRef< HTMLParagraphElement, React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLParagraphElement> >(({ className, ...props }, ref) => { const { formDescriptionId } = useFormField() return ( <p ref={ref} id={formDescriptionId} className={cn("text-[0.8rem] text-muted-foreground", className)} {...props} /> ) }) FormDescription.displayName = "FormDescription" const FormMessage = React.forwardRef< HTMLParagraphElement, React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLParagraphElement> >(({ className, children, ...props }, ref) => { const { error, formMessageId } = useFormField() const body = error ? String(error?.message ?? "") : children if (!body) { return null } return ( <p ref={ref} id={formMessageId} className={cn("text-[0.8rem] font-medium text-destructive", className)} {...props} > {body} </p> ) }) FormMessage.displayName = "FormMessage" export { useFormField, Form, FormItem, FormLabel, FormControl, FormDescription, FormMessage, FormField, } ``` ```tsx file=components/ui/button.tsx import * as React from "react" import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot" import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority" import { cn } from "@/lib/utils" const buttonVariants = cva( "inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:size-4 [&_svg]:shrink-0", { variants: { variant: { default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow hover:bg-primary/90", destructive: "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground shadow-sm hover:bg-destructive/90", outline: "border border-input bg-background shadow-sm hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground", secondary: "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground shadow-sm hover:bg-secondary/80", ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground", link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline", }, size: { default: "h-9 px-4 py-2", sm: "h-8 rounded-md px-3 text-xs", lg: "h-10 rounded-md px-8", icon: "h-9 w-9", }, }, defaultVariants: { variant: "default", size: "default", }, } ) export interface ButtonProps extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>, VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> { asChild?: boolean } const Button = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, ButtonProps>( ({ className, variant, size, asChild = false, ...props }, ref) => { const Comp = asChild ? create the database migration for SkillFoundry: ```ts file=migrations/001_create_skillfoundry_schema.sql -- Users table CREATE TABLE users ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ); -- Tests table (predefined question banks) CREATE TABLE tests ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, level (user test results) CREATE TABLE attempts ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(id), test_id INTEGER REFERENCES tests(id), score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL, details JSONB, -- Per-question results and user answers created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ); -- Micro lessons table CREATE TABLE micro_lessons ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, topic VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, title ``` Now let me create the actions for data operations: ```ts file=actions/getTests.ts import { action } from '@uibakery/data'; function getTests() { return action('getTests', 'SQL', { databaseName: '[Sample] Custom App_sKIA0PCcjg', query: `SELECT id, title, level, topic FROM tests ORDER BY created_at DESC;`, }); } export default getTests; ``` ```ts file=actions/getTest.ts import { action } from '@uibakery/data'; function getTest() { return action('getTest', 'SQL', { databaseName: '[Sample] Custom App_sKIA0PCcjg', query: `SELECT * FROM tests WHERE id = {{testId}};`, }); } export default getTest; ``` ```ts file=actions/submitAttempt.ts import { action } from '@uibakery/data'; function submitAttempt() { return action('submitAttempt', 'SQL', { databaseName: '[Sample] Custom App_sKIA0PCcjg', query: ` INSERT INTO attempts (user_id, test_id, score, details) VALUES ({{userId}}, {{testId}}, {{score}}, {{details}}) RETURNING *; `, }); } export default submitAttempt; ``` ```ts file=actions/getUserAttempts.ts import { action } from '@uibakery/data'; function getUserAttempts() { return action('getUserAttempts', 'SQL', { databaseName: '[Sample] Custom App_sKIA0PCcjg', query: ` SELECT a.*, t.title as test_title, t.topic FROM attempts a JOIN tests t ON a.test_id = t.id WHERE a.user_id = {{userId}} ORDER BY a.created_at DESC; `, }); } export default getUserAttempts; ``` ```ts file=actions/getMicroLesson.ts import { action } from '@uibakery/data'; function getMicroLesson() { return action('getMicroLesson', 'SQL', { databaseName: '[Sample] Custom App_sKIA0PCcjg', query: `SELECT * FROM micro_lessons WHERE topic = {{topic}} LIMIT 1;`, }); } export default getMicroLesson; ``` ```ts file=actions/getLeaderboard.ts import { action } from '@uibakery/data'; function getLeaderboard() { return action('getLeaderboard', 'SQL', { databaseName: '[Sample] Custom App_sKIA0PCcjg', query: ` SELECT u.name, ROUND(AVG(a.score), 1) as avg_score, COUNT(a.id) as attempts FROM users u JOIN attempts a ON u.id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.id, u.name ORDER BY avg_score DESC LIMIT 10; `, }); } export default getLeaderboard; ``` Now let me create the main app structure: ```tsx file=app/app.tsx import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'; import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'; import { Separator } from '@/components/ui/separator'; import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress'; import { BookOpen, Target, TrendingUp, Users, Brain, Award, ChevronRight, User, BarChart3, Trophy } from 'lucide-react'; import Dashboard from './pages/Dashboard'; import Tests from './pages/Tests'; import TestPage from './pages/TestPage'; import Results from './pages/Results'; import Progress as ProgressPage from './pages/Progress'; import Leaderboard from './pages/Leaderboard'; import Profile from './pages/Profile'; interface User { id: number; name: string; email?: string; } export default function App() { const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState('dashboard'); const [selectedTest, setSelectedTest] = useState<any>(null); const [testResults, setTestResults] = useState<any>(null); // Demo user - in real app, this would come from authentication const user: User = { id: 1, name: 'K.Siddhartha', email: 'siddhartha@example.com' }; const navigation = [ { id: 'dashboard', label: 'Dashboard', icon: BarChart3 }, { id: 'tests', label: 'Tests', icon: Target }, { id: 'progress', label: 'Learning Progress', icon: TrendingUp }, { id: 'leaderboard', label: 'Leaderboard', icon: Trophy }, { id: 'profile', label: 'Profile', icon: User }, ]; const renderPage = () => { switch (currentPage) { case 'dashboard': return <Dashboard user={user} onNavigate={setCurrentPage} />; case 'tests': return <Tests user={user} onSelectTest={(test) => { setSelectedTest(test); setCurrentPage('test'); }} />; case 'test': return <TestPage user={user} test={selectedTest} onComplete={(results) => { setTestResults(results); setCurrentPage('results'); }} onBack={() => setCurrentPage('tests')} />; case 'results': return <Results user={user} results={testResults} onRetakeTest={() => setCurrentPage('test')} onBackToDashboard={() => setCurrentPage('dashboard')} />; case 'progress': return <ProgressPage user={user} />; case 'leaderboard': return <Leaderboard user={user} />; case 'profile': return <Profile user={user} />; default: return <Dashboard user={user} onNavigate={setCurrentPage} />; } }; return ( <div className="min-h-screen flex bg-gray-50"> {/* Sidebar */} <aside className="w-64 bg-white shadow-sm border-r"> <div className="p-6 border-b"> <div className="flex items-center gap-2"> <Brain className="h-8 w-8 text-blue-600" /> <div> <h2 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">SkillFoundry</h2> <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">Learn â€¢ Practice â€¢ Improve</p> </div> </div> </div> <nav className="p-4 space-y-2"> {navigation.map((item) => { const Icon = item.icon; return ( <Button key={item.id} variant={currentPage === item.id ? 'default' : 'ghost'} className={`w-full justify-start ${ currentPage === item.id ? 'bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 border-blue-200' : 'text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-900' }`} onClick={() => setCurrentPage(item.id)} > <Icon className="h-4 w-4 mr-3" /> {item.label} </Button> ); })} </nav> <Separator className="mx-4" /> <div className="p-4"> <Card> <CardContent className="p-4"> <div className="flex items-center gap-3"> <div className="h-10 w-10 rounded-full bg-blue-100 flex items-center justify-center"> <User className="h-5 w-5 text-blue-600" /> </div> <div className="flex-1 min-w-0"> <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 truncate"> {user.name} </p> <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">Student</p> </div> </div> </CardContent> </Card> </div> </aside> {/* Main Content */} <main className="flex-1"> <div className="p-6"> {renderPage()} </div> </main> </div> ); } ``` Now let me create the Dashboard page: ```tsx file=app/pages/Dashboard.tsx import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'; import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'; import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress'; import { useLoadAction } from '@uibakery/data'; import { BookOpen, Target, TrendingUp, Clock, ChevronRight, Award, Flame } from 'lucide-react'; import getUserAttempts from '@/actions/getUserAttempts'; interface DashboardProps { user: { id: number; name: string; email?: string }; onNavigate: (page: string) => void; } export default function Dashboard({ user, onNavigate }: DashboardProps) { const [attempts] = useLoadAction(getUserAttempts, [], { userId: user.id }); const stats = React.useMemo(() => { if (!attempts || attempts.length === 0) { return { testsCompleted: 0, averageScore: 0, topicsStudied: 0, totalTime: 0, recentAttempts: [] }; } const totalScore = attempts.reduce((sum: number, attempt: any) => sum + attempt.score, 0); const uniqueTopics = new Set(attempts.map((attempt: any) => attempt.topic)); const recentAttempts = attempts.slice(0, 3); return { testsCompleted: attempts.length, averageScore: Math.round(totalScore / attempts.length), topicsStudied: uniqueTopics.size, totalTime: Math.round(attempts.length * 0.5), // Estimate 0.5 hours per test recentAttempts }; }, [attempts]); const quickActions = [ { label: 'Take JavaScript Test', topic: 'javascript', icon: Target }, { label: 'Python Fundamentals', topic: 'python', icon: BookOpen }, { label: 'SQL Basics', topic: 'sql', icon: Award }, ]; return ( <div className="space-y-6"> {/* Header */} <div className="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-purple-600 rounded-lg p-6 text-white"> <div className="flex items-center justify-between"> <div> <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold mb-2"> Welcome back, {user.name}! ðŸ‘‹ </h1> <p className="text-blue-100"> Ready to continue your learning journey? You're doing great! </p> </div> <div className="text-right"> <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-2"> <Flame className="h-5 w-5" /> <span className="font-semibold">7 day streak!</span> </div> <Badge variant="secondary" className="bg-white/20 text-white"> Learning Level: Beginner </Badge> </div> </div> </div> {/* Stats Cards */} <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4"> <Card> <CardContent className="p-6"> <div className="flex items-center justify-between"> <div> <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Tests Completed</p> <p className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.testsCompleted}</p> </div> <Target className="h-8 w-8 text-blue-500" /> </div> </CardContent> </Card> <Card> <CardContent className="p-6"> <div className="flex items-center } ``` Now let me create the TestPage component: ```tsx file=app/pages/TestPage.tsx import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'; import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'; import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress'; import { useLoadAction, useMutateAction } from '@uibakery/data'; import { ChevronLeft, Clock, CheckCircle, Circle, AlertCircle } from 'lucide-react'; import getTest from '@/actions/getTest'; import submitAttempt from '@/actions/submitAttempt'; interface TestPageProps { user: { id: number; name: string; email?: string }; test: any; onComplete: (results: any) => void; onBack: () => void; } export default function TestPage({ user, test, onComplete, onBack }: TestPageProps) { const [testData] = useLoadAction(getTest, null, { testId: test?.id }); const [submitAttemptAction] = useMutateAction(submitAttempt); const [currentQuestion, setCurrentQuestion] = useState(0); const [answers, setAnswers] = useState<{ [key: number]: any }>({}); const [timeStarted] = useState(Date.now()); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const questions = testData?.items ? JSON.parse(testData.items) : []; useEffect(() => { if (!test) { onBack(); } }, [test, onBack]); const handleAnswer = (questionIndex: number, answer: any) => { setAnswers(prev => ({ ...prev, [questionIndex]: answer })); }; const handleSubmit = async () => { setIsSubmitting(true); try { // Calculate score let correctAnswers = 0; const results = questions.map((question: any, index: number) => { const userAnswer = answers[index]; let isCorrect = false; if (question.type === 'mcq') { isCorrect = userAnswer === question.answer; } else if (question.type === 'tf') { isCorrect = userAnswer === question.answer; } if (isCorrect) correctAnswers++; return { question: question.question, userAnswer, correctAnswer: question.answer, isCorrect, concept: question.concept || 'general', type: question.type, options: question.options }; }); const score = (correctAnswers / questions.length) * 100; const timeSpent = Math.round((Date.now() - timeStarted) / 60000); // minutes // Submit to database await submitAttemptAction({ userId: user.id, testId: test.id, score, details: JSON.stringify({ results, timeSpent, totalQuestions: questions.length, correctAnswers }) }); // Pass results to parent component onComplete({ score, results, timeSpent, totalQuestions: questions.length, correctAnswers, test }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error submitting test:', error); } finally { setIsSubmitting(false); } }; if (!questions || questions.length === 0) { return ( <Card> <CardContent className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-12"> <AlertCircle className="h-12 w-12 text-gray-400 mb-4" /> <p className="text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">Test not found</p> <Button onClick={onBack} variant="outline"> <ChevronLeft className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" /> Go Back </Button> </CardContent> </Card> ); } const progress = ((currentQuestion + 1) / questions.length) * 100; const allAnswered = questions.every((_: any, index: number) => answers[index] !== undefined); return ( <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto space-y-6"> {/* Header */} <div className="flex items-center justify-between"> <div className="flex items-center gap-4"> <Button variant="ghost" onClick={onBack}> <ChevronLeft className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" /> Back </Button> <div> <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{test.title}</h1> <p className="text-gray-600"> Question {currentQuestion + 1} of {questions.length} </p> </div> </div> <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-gray-600"> <Clock className="h-4 w-4" /> <span>~10 minutes</span> </div> </div> {/* Progress */} <div> <div className="flex justify-between text-sm mb-2"> <span>Progress</span> <span>{Math.round(progress)}%</span> </div> <Progress value={progress} className="h-2" /> </div> {/* Question */} <Card> <CardHeader> <div className="flex items-start justify-between"> <div className="flex-1"> <CardTitle className="text-lg"> {currentQuestion + 1}. {questions[currentQuestion]?.question} </CardTitle> {questions[currentQuestion]?.concept && ( <Badge variant="secondary" className="mt-2"> {questions[currentQuestion].concept} </Badge> )} </div> </div> </CardHeader> <CardContent> {questions[currentQuestion]?.type === 'mcq' && ( <div className="space-y-3"> {questions[currentQuestion].options?.map((option: string, index: number) => ( <Button key={index} variant={answers[currentQuestion] === index ? "default" : "outline"} className="w-full justify-start text-left h-auto p-4" onClick={() => handleAnswer(currentQuestion, index)} > <div className="flex items-center gap-3"> <div className="w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-2 flex items-center justify-center"> {answers[currentQuestion] === index && ( <div className="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white" /> )} </div> <span>{option}</span> </div> </Button> ))} </div> )} {questions[currentQuestion]?.type === 'tf' && ( <div className="space-y-3"> <Button variant={answers[currentQuestion] === true ? "default" : "outline"} className="w-full justify-start text-left h-auto p-4" onClick={() => handleAnswer(currentQuestion, true)} > <div className="flex items-center gap-3"> <div className="w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-2 flex items-center justify-center"> {answers[currentQuestion] === true && ( <div className="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white" /> )} </div> <span>True</span> </div> </Button> <Button variant={answers[currentQuestion] === false ? "default" : "outline"} className="w-full justify-start text-left h-auto p-4" onClick={() => handleAnswer(currentQuestion, false)} > <div className="flex items-center gap-3"> <div className="w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-2 flex items-center justify-center"> {answers[currentQuestion] === false && ( <div className="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white" /> )} </div> <span>False</span> </div> </Button> </div> )} </CardContent> </Card> {/* Navigation */} <div className="flex items-center justify-between"> <Button variant="outline" onClick={() => setCurrentQuestion(Math.max(0, currentQuestion - 1))} disabled={currentQuestion === 0} > Previous </Button> <div className="flex items-center gap-2"> {questions.map((_: any, index: number) => ( <Button key={index} variant="ghost" size="sm" className={`w-10 h-10 p-0 ${ index === currentQuestion ? 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-700' : answers[index] !== undefined ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-700' : '' }`} onClick={() => setCurrentQuestion(index)} > {answers[index] !== undefined ? ( <CheckCircle className="h-4 w-4" /> ) : ( <Circle className="h-4 w-4" /> )} </Button> ))} </div> {currentQuestion === questions.length - 1 ? ( <Button onClick={handleSubmit} disabled={!allAnswered || isSubmitting} > {isSubmitting ? 'Submitting...' : 'Submit Test'} </Button> ) : ( <Button onClick={() => setCurrentQuestion(Math.min(questions.length - 1, currentQuestion + 1))} > Next </Button> )} </div> </div> ); } ``` Let me continue with the Results page: ```tsx file=app/pages/Results.tsx import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'; import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'; import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress'; } const { score, results: questionResults, timeSpent, totalQuestions, correctAnswers, test } = results; const percentage = Math.round(score); const wrongAnswers = questionResults.filter((r: any) => !r.isCorrect); const concepts = [...new Set(wrongAnswers.map((r: any) => r.concept))]; const getScoreColor = (score: number) => { if (score >= 80) return 'text-green-600 bg-green-50 border-green-200'; if (score >= 60) return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-50 border-yellow-200'; return 'text-red-600 bg-red-50 border-red-200'; }; const getScoreMessage = (score: number) => { if (score >= 80) return 'Excellent! You have a strong understanding of this topic.'; if (score >= 60) return 'Good work! Review the concepts below to improve further.'; return 'Keep practicing! Focus on the concepts highlighted below.'; }; return ( <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto space-y-6"> {/* Header */} <div className="text-center"> <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">Test Results</h1> <p className="text-gray-600">{test.title}</p> </div> {/* Score Card */} <Card className={`border-2 ${getScoreColor(percentage)}`}> <CardHeader className="text-center"> <div className="flex justify-center mb-4"> {percentage >= 80 ? ( <CheckCircle className="h-16 w-16 text-green-500" /> ) : percentage >= 60 ? ( <Target className="h-16 w-16 text-yellow-500" /> ) : ( <XCircle className="h-16 w-16 text-red-500" /> )} </div> <CardTitle className="text-4xl font-bold">{percentage}%</CardTitle> <CardDescription className="text-lg"> {correctAnswers} out of {totalQuestions} questions correct </CardDescription> <p className="text-sm font-medium mt-2">{getScoreMessage(percentage)}</p> </CardHeader> <CardContent> <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-4 text-center"> <div> <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-green-600">{correctAnswers}</p> <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">Correct</p> </div> <div> <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-red-600">{totalQuestions - correctAnswers}</p> <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">Incorrect</p> </div> <div> <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-600">{timeSpent}m</p> <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">Time Spent</p> </div> </div> </CardContent> </Card> {/* Question Breakdown */} <Card> <CardHeader> <CardTitle className="flex items-center gap-2"> <BookOpen className="h-5 w-5" /> Question Breakdown </CardTitle> <CardDescription> Review your answers and understand the concepts </CardDescription> </CardHeader> <CardContent> <div className="space-y-4"> {questionResults.map((result: any, index: number) => ( <div key={index} className={`p-4 rounded-lg border-2 ${ result.isCorrect ? 'bg-green-50 border-green-200' : 'bg-red-50 border-red-200' }`} > <div className="flex items-start justify-between"> <div className="flex-1"> <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-2"> {result.isCorrect ? ( <CheckCircle className="h-5 w-5 text-green-600" /> ) : ( <XCircle className="h-5 w-5 text-red-600" /> )} <span className="font-medium">Question {index + 1}</span> <Badge variant="secondary">{result.concept}</Badge> </div> <p className="text-gray-900 mb-2">{result.question}</p> <div className="text-sm"> {result.type === 'mcq' && ( <> <p className={result.isCorrect ? 'text-green-700' : 'text-red-700'}> Your answer: {result.options[result.userAnswer]} </p> {!result.isCorrect && ( <p className="text-green-700"> Correct answer: {result.options[result.correctAnswer]} </p> )} </> )} {result.type === 'tf' && ( <> <p className={result.isCorrect ? 'text-green-700' : 'text-red-700'}> Your answer: {result.userAnswer ? 'True' : 'False'} </p> {!result.isCorrect && ( <p className="text-green-700"> Correct answer: {result.correctAnswer ? 'True' : 'False'} </p> )} </> )} </div> </div> {!result.isCorrect && ( <Button size="sm" variant="outline" onClick={() => setSelectedConcept(result.concept)} > <Lightbulb className="h-4 w-4 mr-1" /> Learn </Button> )} </div> </div> ))} </div> </CardContent> </Card> {/* Micro Lesson Modal */} {selectedConcept && microLesson && ( <Card className="border-blue-200 bg-blue-50"> <CardHeader> <CardTitle className="flex items-center gap-2 text-blue-900"> <Lightbulb className="h-5 w-5" /> Quick Lesson: {microLesson.title} </CardTitle> <Button size="sm" variant="ghost" className="absolute top-4 right-4" onClick={() => setSelectedConcept(null)} > âœ• </Button> </CardHeader> <CardContent> <p className="text-blue-800 mb-4">{microLesson.content}</p> {microLesson.code_example && ( <div className="bg-gray-900 text-gray-100 p-4 rounded-lg font-mono text-sm"> <pre>{microLesson.code_example}</pre> </div> )} </CardContent> </Card> )} {/* Improvement Suggestions */} {concepts.length > 0 && ( <Card> <CardHeader> <CardTitle className="flex items-center gap-2"> <TrendingUp className="h-5 w-5" /> Focus Areas for Improvement </CardTitle> <CardDescription> These concepts need more practice based on your answers </CardDescription> </CardHeader> <CardContent> <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-2"> {concepts.map((concept, index) => ( <Badge key={index} variant="secondary" className="cursor-pointer hover:bg-blue-100" onClick={() => setSelectedConcept(concept)} > {concept} </Badge> ))} </div> </CardContent> </Card> )} {/* Actions */} <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center"> <Button onClick={onRetakeTest} variant="outline"> <RefreshCw className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" /> Retake Test </Button> <Button onClick={onBackToDashboard}> <Home className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" /> Back to Dashboard </Button> </div> </div> ); } ``` Now let me create the Progress page: ```tsx file=app/pages/Progress.tsx import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card'; import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge'; import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress'; import { useLoadAction } from '@uibakery/data'; import { TrendingUp, Calendar, Target, Award, BarChart3 } from 'lucide-react'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell, BarChart, Bar } from 'recharts'; import getUserAttempts from '@/actions/getUserAttempts'; interface ProgressProps { user: { id: number; name: string; email?: string }; } export default function Progress({ user }: ProgressProps) { const [attempts] = useLoadAction(getUserAttempts, [], { userId: user.id }); const chartData = React.useMemo(() => { if (!attempts || attempts.length === 0) return []; return attempts.map((attempt: any, index: number) => ({ attempt: index + 1, score: Math.round(attempt.score), date: new Date(attempt.created_at).toLocaleDateString(), topic: attempt.topic })).reverse(); }, [attempts]); const topicData = React.useMemo(() => { if (!attempts || attempts.length === 0) return []; const topics = attempts.reduce((acc: any, attempt: any) => { if (!acc[attempt.topic]) { acc[attempt.topic] = { topic: attempt.topic, scores: [], count: 0 }; } acc[attempt.topic].scores.push(attempt.score); acc[attempt.topic].count++; return acc; }, {}); return Object.values(topics).map((topic: any) => ({ name: topic.topic, averageScore: Math.round(topic.scores.reduce((a: number, b: number) => a + b, 0) / topic.scores.length), attempts: topic.count, fill: topic.topic === 'javascript' ? '#F59E0B' : topic.topic === 'python' ? '#3B82F6' : '#10B981' })); }, [attempts]); const stats = React.useMemo(() => { if (!attempts || attempts.length === 0) { return { totalTests: 0, averageScore: 0, bestScore: 0, totalTime: 0, streak: 0 }; } const scores = attempts.map((a: any) => a.score); const totalScore = scores.reduce((a: number, b: number) => a + b, 0); return { totalTests: attempts.length, averageScore: Math.round(totalScore / attempts.length), bestScore: Math.round(Math.max(...scores)), totalTime: Math.round(attempts.length * 0.5), // Estimate streak: 7 // Mock streak }; }, [attempts]); const pieData = [ { name: 'Correct', value: stats.averageScore, fill: '#10B981' }, { name: 'Incorrect', value: 100 - stats.averageScore, fill: '#EF4444' } ]; return ( <div className="space-y-6"> {/* Header */} <div> <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">Learning Progress</h1> <p className="text-gray-600">Track your improvement and identify areas for growth</p> </div> {/* Stats Overview */} <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-5 gap-4"> <Card> <CardContent className="p-6"> <div className="flex items-center justify-between"> <div> <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Total Tests</p> <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.totalTests}</p> </div> <Target className="h-8 w-8 text-blue-500" /> </div> </CardContent> </Card> <Card> <CardContent className="p-6"> <div className="flex items-center justify-between"> <div> <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Avg Score</p> <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.averageScore}%</p> </div> <BarChart3 className="h-8 w-8 text-green-500" /> </div> </CardContent> </Card> <Card> <CardContent className="p-6"> <div className="flex items-center justify-between"> <div> <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Best Score</p> <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.bestScore}%</p> </div> <Award className="h-8 w-8 text-yellow-500" /> </div> import * as React from "react"
import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const badgeVariants = cva(
  "inline-flex items-center rounded-md border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2",
  {
    variants: {
      variant: {
        default:
          "border-transparent bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow hover:bg-primary/80",
        secondary:
          "border-transparent bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80",
        destructive:
          "border-transparent bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground shadow hover:bg-destructive/80",
        outline: "text-foreground",
      },
    },
    defaultVariants: {
      variant: "default",
    },
  }
)

export interface BadgeProps
  extends React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement>,
    VariantProps<typeof badgeVariants> {}

function Badge({ className, variant, ...props }: BadgeProps) {
  return (
    <div className={cn(badgeVariants({ variant }), className)} {...props} />
  )
}

export { Badge, badgeVariants }

components/ui/form.tsx Writing... 

"use client"

import * as React from "react"
import * as LabelPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-label"
import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
import {
  Controller,
  FormProvider,
  useFormContext,
  type ControllerProps,
  type FieldPath,
  type FieldValues,
} from "react-hook-form"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"
import { Label } from "@/components/ui/label"

const Form = FormProvider

type FormFieldContextValue<
  TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues,
  TName extends FieldPath<TFieldValues> = FieldPath<TFieldValues>
> = {
  name: TName
}

const FormFieldContext = React.createContext<FormFieldContextValue>(
  {} as FormFieldContextValue
)

const FormField = <
  TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues,
  TName extends FieldPath<TFieldValues> = FieldPath<TFieldValues>
>({
  ...props
}: ControllerProps<TFieldValues, TName>) => {
  return (
    <FormFieldContext.Provider value={{ name: props.name }}>
      <Controller {...props} />
    </FormFieldContext.Provider>
  )
}

const useFormField = () => {
  const fieldContext = React.useContext(FormFieldContext)
  const itemContext = React.useContext(FormItemContext)
  const { getFieldState, formState } = useFormContext()

  const fieldState = getFieldState(fieldContext.name, formState)

  if (!fieldContext) {
    throw new Error("useFormField should be used within <FormField>")
  }

  const { id } = itemContext

  return {
    id,
    name: fieldContext.name,
    formItemId: `${id}-form-item`,
    formDescriptionId: `${id}-form-item-description`,
    formMessageId: `${id}-form-item-message`,
    ...fieldState,
  }
}

type FormItemContextValue = {
  id: string
}

const FormItemContext = React.createContext<FormItemContextValue>(
  {} as FormItemContextValue
)

const FormItem = React.forwardRef<
  HTMLDivElement,
  React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLDivElement>
>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => {
  const id = React.useId()

  return (
    <FormItemContext.Provider value={{ id }}>
      <div ref={ref} className={cn("space-y-2", className)} {...props} />
    </FormItemContext.Provider>
  )
})
FormItem.displayName = "FormItem"

const FormLabel = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof LabelPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof LabelPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => {
  const { error, formItemId } = useFormField()

  return (
    <Label
      ref={ref}
      className={cn(error && "text-destructive", className)}
      htmlFor={formItemId}
      {...props}
    />
  )
})
FormLabel.displayName = "FormLabel"

const FormControl = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof Slot>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof Slot>
>(({ ...props }, ref) => {
  const { error, formItemId, formDescriptionId, formMessageId } = useFormField()

  return (
    <Slot
      ref={ref}
      id={formItemId}
      aria-describedby={
        !error
          ? `${formDescriptionId}`
          : `${formDescriptionId} ${formMessageId}`
      }
      aria-invalid={!!error}
      {...props}
    />
  )
})
FormControl.displayName = "FormControl"

const FormDescription = React.forwardRef<
  HTMLParagraphElement,
  React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLParagraphElement>
>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => {
  const { formDescriptionId } = useFormField()

  return (
    <p
      ref={ref}
      id={formDescriptionId}
      className={cn("text-[0.8rem] text-muted-foreground", className)}
      {...props}
    />
  )
})
FormDescription.displayName = "FormDescription"

const FormMessage = React.forwardRef<
  HTMLParagraphElement,
  React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLParagraphElement>
>(({ className, children, ...props }, ref) => {
  const { error, formMessageId } = useFormField()
  const body = error ? String(error?.message ?? "") : children

  if (!body) {
    return null
  }

  return (
    <p
      ref={ref}
      id={formMessageId}
      className={cn("text-[0.8rem] font-medium text-destructive", className)}
      {...props}
    >
      {body}
    </p>
  )
})
FormMessage.displayName = "FormMessage"

export {
  useFormField,
  Form,
  FormItem,
  FormLabel,
  FormControl,
  FormDescription,
  FormMessage,
  FormField,
}
components/ui/button.tsx Writing... 

import * as React from "react"
import { Slot } from "@radix-ui/react-slot"
import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const buttonVariants = cva(
  "inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:size-4 [&_svg]:shrink-0",
  {
    variants: {
      variant: {
        default:
          "bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow hover:bg-primary/90",
        destructive:
          "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground shadow-sm hover:bg-destructive/90",
        outline:
          "border border-input bg-background shadow-sm hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
        secondary:
          "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground shadow-sm hover:bg-secondary/80",
        ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground",
        link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline",
      },
      size: {
        default: "h-9 px-4 py-2",
        sm: "h-8 rounded-md px-3 text-xs",
        lg: "h-10 rounded-md px-8",
        icon: "h-9 w-9",
      },
    },
    defaultVariants: {
      variant: "default",
      size: "default",
    },
  }
)

export interface ButtonProps
  extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>,
    VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> {
  asChild?: boolean
}

const Button = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, ButtonProps>(
  ({ className, variant, size, asChild = false, ...props }, ref) => {
    const Comp = asChild ? Slot : "button"
    return (
      <Comp
        className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
        ref={ref}
        {...props}
      />
    )
  }
)
Button.displayName = "Button"

export { Button, buttonVariants }

Now let me create the database migration for SkillFoundry:
migrations/001_create_skillfoundry_schema.sql Writing... 
-- Users table
CREATE TABLE users (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Tests table (predefined question banks)
CREATE TABLE tests (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  level VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'beginner',
  topic VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  items JSONB NOT NULL, -- Array of questions with options and answers
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Attempts table (user test results)
CREATE TABLE attempts (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(id),
  test_id INTEGER REFERENCES tests(id),
  score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  details JSONB, -- Per-question results and user answers
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Micro lessons table
CREATE TABLE micro_lessons (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  topic VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  code_example TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

    databaseName: '[Sample] Custom App_sKIA0PCcjg',
    query: `SELECT id, title, level, topic FROM tests ORDER BY created_at DESC;`,
  });

function getTest() {

  });

actions/submitAttempt.ts Writing... 
import { action } from '@uibakery/data';

function submitAttempt() {
  return action('submitAttempt', 'SQL', {
    databaseName: '[Sample] Custom App_sKIA0PCcjg',
    query: `
      INSERT INTO attempts (user_id, test_id, score, details)
      VALUES ({{userId}}, {{testId}}, {{score}}, {{details}})
      RETURNING *;
    `,
  });
}

export default submitAttempt;
actions/getUserAttempts.ts Writing... 
import { action } from '@uibakery/data';

function getUserAttempts() {
  return action('getUserAttempts', 'SQL', {
    databaseName: '[Sample] Custom App_sKIA0PCcjg',
    query: `
      SELECT a.*, t.title as test_title, t.topic 
      FROM attempts a 
      JOIN tests t ON a.test_id = t.id 
      WHERE a.user_id = {{userId}}
      ORDER BY a.created_at DESC;
    `,
  });
}

export default getUserAttempts;

function getMicroLesson() {
  return action('getMicroLesson', 'SQL', {

    query: `SELECT * FROM micro_lessons WHERE topic = {{topic}} LIMIT 1;`,
  });
}

actions/getLeaderboard.ts Writing... 
import { action } from '@uibakery/data';

function getLeaderboard() {
  return action('getLeaderboard', 'SQL', {
    databaseName: '[Sample] Custom App_sKIA0PCcjg',
    query: `
      SELECT u.name, ROUND(AVG(a.score), 1) as avg_score, COUNT(a.id) as attempts
      FROM users u
      JOIN attempts a ON u.id = a.user_id
      GROUP BY u.id, u.name
      ORDER BY avg_score DESC
      LIMIT 10;
    `,
  });
}

export default getLeaderboard;

Now let me create the main app structure:
app/app.tsx Writing... 
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { Separator } from '@/components/ui/separator';
import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress';
import { 
  BookOpen, 
  Target, 
  TrendingUp, 
  Users, 
  Brain,
  Award,
  ChevronRight,
  User,
  BarChart3,
  Trophy
} from 'lucide-react';
import Dashboard from './pages/Dashboard';
import Tests from './pages/Tests';
import TestPage from './pages/TestPage';
import Results from './pages/Results';
import Progress as ProgressPage from './pages/Progress';
import Leaderboard from './pages/Leaderboard';
import Profile from './pages/Profile';

interface User {
  id: number;
  name: string;
  email?: string;
}

export default function App() {
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState('dashboard');
  const [selectedTest, setSelectedTest] = useState<any>(null);
  const [testResults, setTestResults] = useState<any>(null);
  
  // Demo user - in real app, this would come from authentication
  const user: User = { id: 1, name: 'K.Siddhartha', email: 'siddhartha@example.com' };

  const navigation = [
    { id: 'dashboard', label: 'Dashboard', icon: BarChart3 },
    { id: 'tests', label: 'Tests', icon: Target },
    { id: 'progress', label: 'Learning Progress', icon: TrendingUp },
    { id: 'leaderboard', label: 'Leaderboard', icon: Trophy },
    { id: 'profile', label: 'Profile', icon: User },
  ];

  const renderPage = () => {
    switch (currentPage) {
      case 'dashboard':
        return <Dashboard user={user} onNavigate={setCurrentPage} />;
      case 'tests':
        return <Tests user={user} onSelectTest={(test) => {
          setSelectedTest(test);
          setCurrentPage('test');
        }} />;
      case 'test':
        return <TestPage 
          user={user} 
          test={selectedTest} 
          onComplete={(results) => {
            setTestResults(results);
            setCurrentPage('results');
          }}
          onBack={() => setCurrentPage('tests')}
        />;
      case 'results':
        return <Results 
          user={user}
          results={testResults}
          onRetakeTest={() => setCurrentPage('test')}
          onBackToDashboard={() => setCurrentPage('dashboard')}
        />;
      case 'progress':
        return <ProgressPage user={user} />;
      case 'leaderboard':
        return <Leaderboard user={user} />;
      case 'profile':
        return <Profile user={user} />;
      default:
        return <Dashboard user={user} onNavigate={setCurrentPage} />;
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen flex bg-gray-50">
      {/* Sidebar */}
      <aside className="w-64 bg-white shadow-sm border-r">
        <div className="p-6 border-b">
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <Brain className="h-8 w-8 text-blue-600" />
            <div>
              <h2 className="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">SkillFoundry</h2>
              <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">Learn â€¢ Practice â€¢ Improve</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <nav className="p-4 space-y-2">
          {navigation.map((item) => {
            const Icon = item.icon;
            return (
              <Button
                key={item.id}
                variant={currentPage === item.id ? 'default' : 'ghost'}
                className={`w-full justify-start ${
                  currentPage === item.id 
                    ? 'bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 border-blue-200' 
                    : 'text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-900'
                }`}
                onClick={() => setCurrentPage(item.id)}
              >
                <Icon className="h-4 w-4 mr-3" />
                {item.label}
              </Button>
            );
          })}
        </nav>

        <Separator className="mx-4" />
        
        <div className="p-4">
          <Card>
            <CardContent className="p-4">
              <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                <div className="h-10 w-10 rounded-full bg-blue-100 flex items-center justify-center">
                  <User className="h-5 w-5 text-blue-600" />
                </div>
                <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
                  <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 truncate">
                    {user.name}
                  </p>
                  <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">Student</p>
                </div>
              </div>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </div>
      </aside>

      {/* Main Content */}
      <main className="flex-1">
        <div className="p-6">
          {renderPage()}
        </div>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
}

import React from 'react';
import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress';
import { useLoadAction } from '@uibakery/data';
import { 
  BookOpen, 
  Target, 
  TrendingUp, 
  Clock,
  ChevronRight,
  Award,
  Flame
} from 'lucide-react';
import getUserAttempts from '@/actions/getUserAttempts';

interface DashboardProps {
  user: { id: number; name: string; email?: string };
  onNavigate: (page: string) => void;
}

export default function Dashboard({ user, onNavigate }: DashboardProps) {
  const [attempts] = useLoadAction(getUserAttempts, [], { userId: user.id });

  const stats = React.useMemo(() => {
    if (!attempts || attempts.length === 0) {
      return {
        testsCompleted: 0,
        averageScore: 0,
        topicsStudied: 0,
        totalTime: 0,
        recentAttempts: []
      };
    }

    const totalScore = attempts.reduce((sum: number, attempt: any) => sum + attempt.score, 0);
    const uniqueTopics = new Set(attempts.map((attempt: any) => attempt.topic));
    const recentAttempts = attempts.slice(0, 3);

    return {
      testsCompleted: attempts.length,
      averageScore: Math.round(totalScore / attempts.length),
      topicsStudied: uniqueTopics.size,
      totalTime: Math.round(attempts.length * 0.5), // Estimate 0.5 hours per test
      recentAttempts
    };
  }, [attempts]);

  const quickActions = [
    { label: 'Take JavaScript Test', topic: 'javascript', icon: Target },
    { label: 'Python Fundamentals', topic: 'python', icon: BookOpen },
    { label: 'SQL Basics', topic: 'sql', icon: Award },
  ];

  return (
    <div className="space-y-6">
      {/* Header */}
      <div className="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-purple-600 rounded-lg p-6 text-white">
        <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
          <div>
            <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold mb-2">
              Welcome back, {user.name}! ðŸ‘‹
            </h1>
            <p className="text-blue-100">
              Ready to continue your learning journey? You're doing great!
            </p>
          </div>
          <div className="text-right">
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-2">
              <Flame className="h-5 w-5" />
              <span className="font-semibold">7 day streak!</span>
            </div>
            <Badge variant="secondary" className="bg-white/20 text-white">
              Learning Level: Beginner
            </Badge>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Stats Cards */}
      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4">
        <Card>
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
              <div>
                <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Tests Completed</p>
                <p className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.testsCompleted}</p>
              </div>
              <Target className="h-8 w-8 text-blue-500" />
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        <Card>
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
              <div>
                <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Average Score</p>
                <p className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.averageScore}%</p>
              </div>
              <TrendingUp className="h-8 w-8 text-green-500" />
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        <Card>
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
              <div>
                <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Topics Studied</p>
                <p className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.topicsStudied}</p>
              </div>
              <BookOpen className="h-8 w-8 text-purple-500" />
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        <Card>
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
              <div>
                <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Study Hours</p>
                <p className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.totalTime}h</p>
              </div>
              <Clock className="h-8 w-8 text-orange-500" />
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>
      </div>

      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
        {/* Quick Actions */}
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle className="text-xl">Quick Start</CardTitle>
            <CardDescription>
              Jump into popular tests and start improving your skills
            </CardDescription>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent className="space-y-3">
            {quickActions.map((action, index) => {
              const Icon = action.icon;
              return (
                <Button
                  key={index}
                  variant="outline"
                  className="w-full justify-between h-12"
                  onClick={() => onNavigate('tests')}
                >
                  <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                    <Icon className="h-5 w-5" />
                    <span>{action.label}</span>
                  </div>
                  <ChevronRight className="h-4 w-4" />
                </Button>
              );
            })}
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        {/* Recent Activity */}
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle className="text-xl">Recent Activity</CardTitle>
            <CardDescription>
              Your latest test attempts and progress
            </CardDescription>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent>
            {stats.recentAttempts.length === 0 ? (
              <div className="text-center py-8 text-gray-500">
                <Target className="h-12 w-12 mx-auto mb-4 opacity-50" />
                <p>No tests taken yet</p>
                <p className="text-sm">Start your first test to see your progress!</p>
              </div>
            ) : (
              <div className="space-y-4">
                {stats.recentAttempts.map((attempt: any, index: number) => (
                  <div key={index} className="flex items-center justify-between p-3 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg">
                    <div className="flex-1">
                      <p className="font-medium text-gray-900">{attempt.test_title}</p>
                      <p className="text-sm text-gray-500 capitalize">{attempt.topic}</p>
                    </div>
                    <div className="text-right">
                      <Badge 
                        variant={attempt.score >= 80 ? "default" : attempt.score >= 60 ? "secondary" : "destructive"}
                      >
                        {Math.round(attempt.score)}%
                      </Badge>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </CardContent>
        </Card>
      </div>

      {/* Learning Progress Overview */}
      <Card>
        <CardHeader>
          <CardTitle className="text-xl">Your Learning Journey</CardTitle>
          <CardDescription>
            Track your progress across different programming topics
          </CardDescription>
        </CardHeader>
        <CardContent>
          <div className="space-y-4">
            <div>
              <div className="flex justify-between text-sm mb-2">
                <span>JavaScript Fundamentals</span>
                <span>75%</span>
              </div>
              <Progress value={75} className="h-2" />
            </div>
            <div>
              <div className="flex justify-between text-sm mb-2">
                <span>Python Basics</span>
                <span>60%</span>
              </div>
              <Progress value={60} className="h-2" />
            </div>
            <div>
              <div className="flex justify-between text-sm mb-2">
                <span>SQL Fundamentals</span>
                <span>40%</span>
              </div>
              <Progress value={40} className="h-2" />
            </div>
          </div>
          
          <div className="mt-6 pt-4 border-t">
            <Button 
              onClick={() => onNavigate('progress')} 
              variant="outline" 
              className="w-full"
            >
              View Detailed Progress
              <ChevronRight className="h-4 w-4 ml-2" />
            </Button>
          </div>
        </CardContent>
      </Card>
    </div>
  );
}
