import React from 'react';
import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { useLoadAction } from '@uibakery/data';
import { 
  Code, 
  Database, 
  Globe,
  Clock,
  Target,
  ChevronRight,
  Star
} from 'lucide-react';
import getTests from '@/actions/getTests';

interface TestsProps {
  user: { id: number; name: string; email?: string };
  onSelectTest: (test: any) => void;
}

export default function Tests({ user, onSelectTest }: TestsProps) {
  const [tests] = useLoadAction(getTests, []);

  const getTopicIcon = (topic: string) => {
    switch (topic.toLowerCase()) {
      case 'javascript':
        return Code;
      case 'python':
        return Code;
      case 'sql':
        return Database;
      default:
        return Globe;
    }
  };

  const getTopicColor = (topic: string) => {
    switch (topic.toLowerCase()) {
      case 'javascript':
        return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800';
      case 'python':
        return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800';
      case 'sql':
        return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800';
      default:
        return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800';
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className="space-y-6">
      {/* Header */}

        <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">
          Choose Your Test
        </h1>

      {/* Featured Tests */}
      <div>

        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">

                          <CardDescription className="capitalize">
                            {test.topic} â€¢ {test.level}
                          </CardDescription>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                      <Badge className={getTopicColor(test.topic)}>

Now let me create the TestPage component:
app/pages/TestPage.tsx Writing... 
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress';
import { useLoadAction, useMutateAction } from '@uibakery/data';
import { 
  ChevronLeft, 
  Clock,
  CheckCircle,
  Circle,
  AlertCircle
} from 'lucide-react';
import getTest from '@/actions/getTest';
import submitAttempt from '@/actions/submitAttempt';

interface TestPageProps {
  user: { id: number; name: string; email?: string };
  test: any;
  onComplete: (results: any) => void;
  onBack: () => void;
}

export default function TestPage({ user, test, onComplete, onBack }: TestPageProps) {
  const [testData] = useLoadAction(getTest, null, { testId: test?.id });
  const [submitAttemptAction] = useMutateAction(submitAttempt);
  
  const [currentQuestion, setCurrentQuestion] = useState(0);
  const [answers, setAnswers] = useState<{ [key: number]: any }>({});
  const [timeStarted] = useState(Date.now());
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);

  const questions = testData?.items ? JSON.parse(testData.items) : [];

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!test) {
      onBack();
    }
  }, [test, onBack]);

  const handleAnswer = (questionIndex: number, answer: any) => {
    setAnswers(prev => ({ ...prev, [questionIndex]: answer }));
  };

  const handleSubmit = async () => {
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    try {
      // Calculate score
      let correctAnswers = 0;
      const results = questions.map((question: any, index: number) => {
        const userAnswer = answers[index];
        let isCorrect = false;

        if (question.type === 'mcq') {
          isCorrect = userAnswer === question.answer;
        } else if (question.type === 'tf') {
          isCorrect = userAnswer === question.answer;
        }

        if (isCorrect) correctAnswers++;

        return {
          question: question.question,
          userAnswer,
          correctAnswer: question.answer,
          isCorrect,
          concept: question.concept || 'general',
          type: question.type,
          options: question.options
        };
      });

      const score = (correctAnswers / questions.length) * 100;
      const timeSpent = Math.round((Date.now() - timeStarted) / 60000); // minutes

      // Submit to database
      await submitAttemptAction({
        userId: user.id,
        testId: test.id,
        score,
        details: JSON.stringify({
          results,
          timeSpent,
          totalQuestions: questions.length,
          correctAnswers
        })
      });

      // Pass results to parent component
      onComplete({
        score,
        results,
        timeSpent,
        totalQuestions: questions.length,
        correctAnswers,
        test
      });
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error submitting test:', error);
    } finally {
      setIsSubmitting(false);
    }
  };

  if (!questions || questions.length === 0) {
    return (
      <Card>
        <CardContent className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-12">
          <AlertCircle className="h-12 w-12 text-gray-400 mb-4" />
          <p className="text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">Test not found</p>
          <Button onClick={onBack} variant="outline">
            <ChevronLeft className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
            Go Back
          </Button>
        </CardContent>
      </Card>
    );
  }

  const progress = ((currentQuestion + 1) / questions.length) * 100;
  const allAnswered = questions.every((_: any, index: number) => answers[index] !== undefined);

  return (
    <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto space-y-6">
      {/* Header */}
      <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
        <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
          <Button variant="ghost" onClick={onBack}>
            <ChevronLeft className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
            Back
          </Button>
          <div>
            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{test.title}</h1>
            <p className="text-gray-600">
              Question {currentQuestion + 1} of {questions.length}
            </p>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div className="flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
          <Clock className="h-4 w-4" />
          <span>~10 minutes</span>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Progress */}
      <div>
        <div className="flex justify-between text-sm mb-2">
          <span>Progress</span>
          <span>{Math.round(progress)}%</span>
        </div>
        <Progress value={progress} className="h-2" />
      </div>

      {/* Question */}
      <Card>
        <CardHeader>
          <div className="flex items-start justify-between">
            <div className="flex-1">
              <CardTitle className="text-lg">
                {currentQuestion + 1}. {questions[currentQuestion]?.question}
              </CardTitle>
              {questions[currentQuestion]?.concept && (
                <Badge variant="secondary" className="mt-2">
                  {questions[currentQuestion].concept}
                </Badge>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </CardHeader>
        
        <CardContent>
          {questions[currentQuestion]?.type === 'mcq' && (
            <div className="space-y-3">
              {questions[currentQuestion].options?.map((option: string, index: number) => (
                <Button
                  key={index}
                  variant={answers[currentQuestion] === index ? "default" : "outline"}
                  className="w-full justify-start text-left h-auto p-4"
                  onClick={() => handleAnswer(currentQuestion, index)}
                >
                  <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                    <div className="w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-2 flex items-center justify-center">
                      {answers[currentQuestion] === index && (
                        <div className="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white" />
                      )}
                    </div>
                    <span>{option}</span>
                  </div>
                </Button>
              ))}
            </div>
          )}

          {questions[currentQuestion]?.type === 'tf' && (
            <div className="space-y-3">
              <Button
                variant={answers[currentQuestion] === true ? "default" : "outline"}
                className="w-full justify-start text-left h-auto p-4"
                onClick={() => handleAnswer(currentQuestion, true)}
              >
                <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                  <div className="w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-2 flex items-center justify-center">
                    {answers[currentQuestion] === true && (
                      <div className="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white" />
                    )}
                  </div>
                  <span>True</span>
                </div>
              </Button>
              <Button
                variant={answers[currentQuestion] === false ? "default" : "outline"}
                className="w-full justify-start text-left h-auto p-4"
                onClick={() => handleAnswer(currentQuestion, false)}
              >
                <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                  <div className="w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-2 flex items-center justify-center">
                    {answers[currentQuestion] === false && (
                      <div className="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-white" />
                    )}
                  </div>
                  <span>False</span>
                </div>
              </Button>
            </div>
          )}
        </CardContent>
      </Card>

      {/* Navigation */}
      <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
        <Button
          variant="outline"
          onClick={() => setCurrentQuestion(Math.max(0, currentQuestion - 1))}
          disabled={currentQuestion === 0}
        >
          Previous
        </Button>

        <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
          {questions.map((_: any, index: number) => (
            <Button
              key={index}
              variant="ghost"
              size="sm"
              className={`w-10 h-10 p-0 ${
                index === currentQuestion 
                  ? 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-700' 
                  : answers[index] !== undefined 
                    ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-700' 
                    : ''
              }`}
              onClick={() => setCurrentQuestion(index)}
            >
              {answers[index] !== undefined ? (
                <CheckCircle className="h-4 w-4" />
              ) : (
                <Circle className="h-4 w-4" />
              )}
            </Button>
          ))}
        </div>

        {currentQuestion === questions.length - 1 ? (
          <Button
            onClick={handleSubmit}
            disabled={!allAnswered || isSubmitting}
          >
            {isSubmitting ? 'Submitting...' : 'Submit Test'}
          </Button>
        ) : (
          <Button
            onClick={() => setCurrentQuestion(Math.min(questions.length - 1, currentQuestion + 1))}
          >
            Next
          </Button>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

Let me continue with the Results page:
app/pages/Results.tsx Writing... 
import React from 'react';
import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress';
import { useLoadAction } from '@uibakery/data';
import { 
  CheckCircle, 
  XCircle, 
  TrendingUp,
  BookOpen,
  RefreshCw,
  Home,
  Lightbulb,
  Target
} from 'lucide-react';
import getMicroLesson from '@/actions/getMicroLesson';

interface ResultsProps {
  user: { id: number; name: string; email?: string };
  results: any;
  onRetakeTest: () => void;
  onBackToDashboard: () => void;
}

export default function Results({ user, results, onRetakeTest, onBackToDashboard }: ResultsProps) {
  const [selectedConcept, setSelectedConcept] = React.useState<string | null>(null);
  const [microLesson] = useLoadAction(getMicroLesson, null, { topic: selectedConcept });

  if (!results) {
    return (
      <Card>
        <CardContent className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-12">
          <p>No results to display</p>
          <Button onClick={onBackToDashboard} className="mt-4">
            Back to Dashboard
          </Button>
        </CardContent>
      </Card>
    );
  }

  const { score, results: questionResults, timeSpent, totalQuestions, correctAnswers, test } = results;
  const percentage = Math.round(score);
  const wrongAnswers = questionResults.filter((r: any) => !r.isCorrect);
  const concepts = [...new Set(wrongAnswers.map((r: any) => r.concept))];

  const getScoreColor = (score: number) => {
    if (score >= 80) return 'text-green-600 bg-green-50 border-green-200';
    if (score >= 60) return 'text-yellow-600 bg-yellow-50 border-yellow-200';
    return 'text-red-600 bg-red-50 border-red-200';
  };

  const getScoreMessage = (score: number) => {
    if (score >= 80) return 'Excellent! You have a strong understanding of this topic.';
    if (score >= 60) return 'Good work! Review the concepts below to improve further.';
    return 'Keep practicing! Focus on the concepts highlighted below.';
  };

  return (
    <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto space-y-6">
      {/* Header */}
      <div className="text-center">
        <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">Test Results</h1>
        <p className="text-gray-600">{test.title}</p>
      </div>

      {/* Score Card */}
      <Card className={`border-2 ${getScoreColor(percentage)}`}>
        <CardHeader className="text-center">
          <div className="flex justify-center mb-4">
            {percentage >= 80 ? (
              <CheckCircle className="h-16 w-16 text-green-500" />
            ) : percentage >= 60 ? (
              <Target className="h-16 w-16 text-yellow-500" />
            ) : (
              <XCircle className="h-16 w-16 text-red-500" />
            )}
          </div>
          <CardTitle className="text-4xl font-bold">{percentage}%</CardTitle>
          <CardDescription className="text-lg">
            {correctAnswers} out of {totalQuestions} questions correct
          </CardDescription>
          <p className="text-sm font-medium mt-2">{getScoreMessage(percentage)}</p>
        </CardHeader>
        
        <CardContent>
          <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-4 text-center">
            <div>
              <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-green-600">{correctAnswers}</p>
              <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">Correct</p>
            </div>
            <div>
              <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-red-600">{totalQuestions - correctAnswers}</p>
              <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">Incorrect</p>
            </div>
            <div>
              <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-blue-600">{timeSpent}m</p>
              <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">Time Spent</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </CardContent>
      </Card>

      {/* Question Breakdown */}
      <Card>
        <CardHeader>
          <CardTitle className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <BookOpen className="h-5 w-5" />
            Question Breakdown
          </CardTitle>
          <CardDescription>
            Review your answers and understand the concepts
          </CardDescription>
        </CardHeader>
        <CardContent>
          <div className="space-y-4">
            {questionResults.map((result: any, index: number) => (
              <div
                key={index}
                className={`p-4 rounded-lg border-2 ${
                  result.isCorrect 
                    ? 'bg-green-50 border-green-200' 
                    : 'bg-red-50 border-red-200'
                }`}
              >
                <div className="flex items-start justify-between">
                  <div className="flex-1">
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-2">
                      {result.isCorrect ? (
                        <CheckCircle className="h-5 w-5 text-green-600" />
                      ) : (
                        <XCircle className="h-5 w-5 text-red-600" />
                      )}
                      <span className="font-medium">Question {index + 1}</span>
                      <Badge variant="secondary">{result.concept}</Badge>
                    </div>
                    
                    <p className="text-gray-900 mb-2">{result.question}</p>
                    
                    <div className="text-sm">
                      {result.type === 'mcq' && (
                        <>
                          <p className={result.isCorrect ? 'text-green-700' : 'text-red-700'}>
                            Your answer: {result.options[result.userAnswer]}
                          </p>
                          {!result.isCorrect && (
                            <p className="text-green-700">
                              Correct answer: {result.options[result.correctAnswer]}
                            </p>
                          )}
                        </>
                      )}
                      {result.type === 'tf' && (
                        <>
                          <p className={result.isCorrect ? 'text-green-700' : 'text-red-700'}>
                            Your answer: {result.userAnswer ? 'True' : 'False'}
                          </p>
                          {!result.isCorrect && (
                            <p className="text-green-700">
                              Correct answer: {result.correctAnswer ? 'True' : 'False'}
                            </p>
                          )}
                        </>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  
                  {!result.isCorrect && (
                    <Button
                      size="sm"
                      variant="outline"
                      onClick={() => setSelectedConcept(result.concept)}
                    >
                      <Lightbulb className="h-4 w-4 mr-1" />
                      Learn
                    </Button>
                  )}
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </CardContent>
      </Card>

      {/* Micro Lesson Modal */}
      {selectedConcept && microLesson && (
        <Card className="border-blue-200 bg-blue-50">
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle className="flex items-center gap-2 text-blue-900">
              <Lightbulb className="h-5 w-5" />
              Quick Lesson: {microLesson.title}
            </CardTitle>
            <Button
              size="sm"
              variant="ghost"
              className="absolute top-4 right-4"
              onClick={() => setSelectedConcept(null)}
            >
              âœ•
            </Button>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent>
            <p className="text-blue-800 mb-4">{microLesson.content}</p>
            {microLesson.code_example && (
              <div className="bg-gray-900 text-gray-100 p-4 rounded-lg font-mono text-sm">
                <pre>{microLesson.code_example}</pre>
              </div>
            )}
          </CardContent>
        </Card>
      )}

      {/* Improvement Suggestions */}
      {concepts.length > 0 && (
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle className="flex items-center gap-2">
              <TrendingUp className="h-5 w-5" />
              Focus Areas for Improvement
            </CardTitle>
            <CardDescription>
              These concepts need more practice based on your answers
            </CardDescription>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent>
            <div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-2">
              {concepts.map((concept, index) => (
                <Badge
                  key={index}
                  variant="secondary"
                  className="cursor-pointer hover:bg-blue-100"
                  onClick={() => setSelectedConcept(concept)}
                >
                  {concept}
                </Badge>
              ))}
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>
      )}

      {/* Actions */}
      <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center">
        <Button onClick={onRetakeTest} variant="outline">
          <RefreshCw className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
          Retake Test
        </Button>
        <Button onClick={onBackToDashboard}>
          <Home className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
          Back to Dashboard
        </Button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

Now let me create the Progress page:
app/pages/Progress.tsx Writing... 
import React from 'react';
import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress';
import { useLoadAction } from '@uibakery/data';
import { 
  TrendingUp, 
  Calendar,
  Target,
  Award,
  BarChart3
} from 'lucide-react';
import {
  LineChart,
  Line,
  XAxis,
  YAxis,
  CartesianGrid,
  Tooltip,
  ResponsiveContainer,
  PieChart,
  Pie,
  Cell,
  BarChart,
  Bar
} from 'recharts';
import getUserAttempts from '@/actions/getUserAttempts';

interface ProgressProps {
  user: { id: number; name: string; email?: string };
}

export default function Progress({ user }: ProgressProps) {
  const [attempts] = useLoadAction(getUserAttempts, [], { userId: user.id });

  const chartData = React.useMemo(() => {
    if (!attempts || attempts.length === 0) return [];
    
    return attempts.map((attempt: any, index: number) => ({
      attempt: index + 1,
      score: Math.round(attempt.score),
      date: new Date(attempt.created_at).toLocaleDateString(),
      topic: attempt.topic
    })).reverse();
  }, [attempts]);

  const topicData = React.useMemo(() => {
    if (!attempts || attempts.length === 0) return [];
    
    const topics = attempts.reduce((acc: any, attempt: any) => {
      if (!acc[attempt.topic]) {
        acc[attempt.topic] = { topic: attempt.topic, scores: [], count: 0 };
      }
      acc[attempt.topic].scores.push(attempt.score);
      acc[attempt.topic].count++;
      return acc;
    }, {});

    return Object.values(topics).map((topic: any) => ({
      name: topic.topic,
      averageScore: Math.round(topic.scores.reduce((a: number, b: number) => a + b, 0) / topic.scores.length),
      attempts: topic.count,
      fill: topic.topic === 'javascript' ? '#F59E0B' : topic.topic === 'python' ? '#3B82F6' : '#10B981'
    }));
  }, [attempts]);

  const stats = React.useMemo(() => {
    if (!attempts || attempts.length === 0) {
      return {
        totalTests: 0,
        averageScore: 0,
        bestScore: 0,
        totalTime: 0,
        streak: 0
      };
    }

    const scores = attempts.map((a: any) => a.score);
    const totalScore = scores.reduce((a: number, b: number) => a + b, 0);
    
    return {
      totalTests: attempts.length,
      averageScore: Math.round(totalScore / attempts.length),
      bestScore: Math.round(Math.max(...scores)),
      totalTime: Math.round(attempts.length * 0.5), // Estimate
      streak: 7 // Mock streak
    };
  }, [attempts]);

  const pieData = [
    { name: 'Correct', value: stats.averageScore, fill: '#10B981' },
    { name: 'Incorrect', value: 100 - stats.averageScore, fill: '#EF4444' }
  ];

  return (
    <div className="space-y-6">
      {/* Header */}
      <div>
        <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">Learning Progress</h1>
        <p className="text-gray-600">Track your improvement and identify areas for growth</p>
      </div>

      {/* Stats Overview */}
      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-5 gap-4">
        <Card>
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
              <div>
                <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Total Tests</p>
                <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.totalTests}</p>
              </div>
              <Target className="h-8 w-8 text-blue-500" />
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        <Card>
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
              <div>
                <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Avg Score</p>
                <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.averageScore}%</p>
              </div>
              <BarChart3 className="h-8 w-8 text-green-500" />
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        <Card>
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
              <div>
                <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Best Score</p>
                <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.bestScore}%</p>
              </div>
              <Award className="h-8 w-8 text-yellow-500" />
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        <Card>
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
              <div>
                <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Study Time</p>
                <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.totalTime}h</p>
              </div>
              <Calendar className="h-8 w-8 text-purple-500" />
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        <Card>
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
              <div>
                <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-600">Streak</p>
                <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{stats.streak} days</p>
              </div>
              <TrendingUp className="h-8 w-8 text-orange-500" />
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>
      </div>

      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
        {/* Score Progression */}
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle>Score Progression</CardTitle>
            <CardDescription>Your performance over time</CardDescription>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent>
            {chartData.length > 0 ? (
              <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
                <LineChart data={chartData}>
                  <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
                  <XAxis dataKey="attempt" />
                  <YAxis domain={[0, 100]} />
                  <Tooltip />
                  <Line 
                    type="monotone" 
                    dataKey="score" 
                    stroke="#3B82F6" 
                    strokeWidth={3}
                    dot={{ fill: '#3B82F6' }}
                  />
                </LineChart>
              </ResponsiveContainer>
            ) : (
              <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-[300px] text-gray-500">
                <div className="text-center">
                  <Target className="h-12 w-12 mx-auto mb-4 opacity-50" />
                  <p>No test data available</p>
                  <p className="text-sm">Take some tests to see your progress!</p>
                </div>
              </div>
            )}
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        {/* Performance by Topic */}
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle>Performance by Topic</CardTitle>
            <CardDescription>Average scores across different subjects</CardDescription>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent>
            {topicData.length > 0 ? (
              <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={300}>
                <BarChart data={topicData}>
                  <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" />
                  <XAxis dataKey="name" />
                  <YAxis domain={[0, 100]} />
                  <Tooltip />
                  <Bar dataKey="averageScore" radius={[4, 4, 0, 0]} />
                </BarChart>
              </ResponsiveContainer>
            ) : (
              <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-[300px] text-gray-500">
                <div className="text-center">
                  <BarChart3 className="h-12 w-12 mx-auto mb-4 opacity-50" />
                  <p>No topic data available</p>
                </div>
              </div>
            )}
          </CardContent>
        </Card>
      </div>

      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
        {/* Overall Accuracy */}
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle>Overall Accuracy</CardTitle>
            <CardDescription>Your correct vs incorrect answers</CardDescription>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent>
            <div className="flex items-center justify-center">
              <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={200}>
                <PieChart>
                  <Pie
                    data={pieData}
                    cx="50%"
                    cy="50%"
                    innerRadius={60}
                    outerRadius={80}
                    paddingAngle={5}
                    dataKey="value"
                  >
                    {pieData.map((entry, index) => (
                      <Cell key={`cell-${index}`} fill={entry.fill} />
                    ))}
                  </Pie>
                  <Tooltip />
                </PieChart>
              </ResponsiveContainer>
            </div>
            <div className="flex justify-center gap-4 mt-4">
              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                <div className="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-green-500"></div>
                <span className="text-sm">Correct ({stats.averageScore}%)</span>
              </div>
              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                <div className="w-3 h-3 rounded-full bg-red-500"></div>
                <span className="text-sm">Incorrect ({100 - stats.averageScore}%)</span>
              </div>
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        {/* Topic Mastery */}
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle>Topic Mastery</CardTitle>
            <CardDescription>Your progress in different areas</CardDescription>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent className="space-y-4">
            <div>
              <div className="flex justify-between text-sm mb-2">
                <span>JavaScript</span>
                <span>75%</span>
              </div>
              <Progress value={75} className="h-2" />
              <Badge variant="secondary" className="mt-1">Advanced Beginner</Badge>
            </div>
            <div>
              <div className="flex justify-between text-sm mb-2">
                <span>Python</span>
                <span>60%</span>
              </div>
              <Progress value={60} className="h-2" />
              <Badge variant="secondary" className="mt-1">Beginner</Badge>
            </div>
            <div>
              <div className="flex justify-between text-sm mb-2">
                <span>SQL</span>
                <span>40%</span>
              </div>
              <Progress value={40} className="h-2" />
              <Badge variant="secondary" className="mt-1">Beginner</Badge>
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>
      </div>

      {/* Recent Activity */}
      {attempts && attempts.length > 0 && (
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <CardTitle>Recent Activity</CardTitle>
            <CardDescription>Your latest test attempts</CardDescription>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardContent>
            <div className="space-y-4">
              {attempts.slice(0, 5).map((attempt: any, index: number) => (
                <div key={index} className="flex items-center justify-between p-3 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg">
                  <div className="flex-1">
                    <p className="font-medium text-gray-900">{attempt.test_title}</p>
                    <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">
                      {new Date(attempt.created_at).toLocaleDateString()} â€¢ {attempt.topic}
                    </p>
                  </div>
                  <Badge 
                    variant={attempt.score >= 80 ? "default" : attempt.score >= 60 ? "secondary" : "destructive"}
                  >
                    {Math.round(attempt.score)}%
                  </Badge>
                </div>
              ))}
            </div>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

Now let me create the Leaderboard page:
app/pages/Leaderboard.tsx Writing... 
import React from 'react';
import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { useLoadAction } from '@uibakery/data';
import { Trophy, Medal, Award, Crown, User } from 'lucide-react';
import getLeaderboard from '@/actions/getLeaderboard';

interface LeaderboardProps {
  user: { id: number; name: string; email?: string };
}

export default function Leaderboard({ user }: LeaderboardProps) {
  const [leaderboard] = useLoadAction(getLeaderboard, []);

  const getRankIcon = (rank: number) => {
    switch (rank) {
      case 1:
        return <Crown className="h-6 w-6 text-yellow-500" />;
      case 2:
        return <Medal className="h-6 w-6 text-gray-400" />;
      case 3:
        return <Award className="h-6 w-6 text-orange-500" />;
      default:
        return <span className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-600">#{rank}</span>;
    }
  };

  const getRankBadge = (rank: number) => {
    if (rank === 1) return 'bg-gradient-to-r from-yellow-400 to-yellow-600 text-white';
    if (rank === 2) return 'bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-300 to-gray-500 text-white';
    if (rank === 3) return 'bg-gradient-to-r from-orange-400 to-orange-600 text-white';
    return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-700';
  };

  return (
    <div className="space-y-6">
      {/* Header */}
      <div className="text-center">
        <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 mb-4">
          <Trophy className="h-8 w-8 text-yellow-500" />
          <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900">Leaderboard</h1>
        </div>
        <p className="text-gray-600">
          See how you rank against other learners in the SkillFoundry community
        </p>
      </div>

      {/* Leaderboard */}
      <Card>
        <CardHeader>
          <CardTitle className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <Trophy className="h-5 w-5 text-yellow-500" />
            Top Performers
          </CardTitle>
          <CardDescription>
            Rankings based on average test scores across all subjects
          </CardDescription>
        </CardHeader>
        <CardContent>
          {leaderboard && leaderboard.length > 0 ? (
            <div className="space-y-3">
              {leaderboard.map((entry: any, index: number) => {
                const rank = index + 1;
                const isCurrentUser = entry.name === user.name;
                
                return (
                  <div
                    key={index}
                    className={`flex items-center justify-between p-4 rounded-lg border-2 transition-colors ${
                      isCurrentUser 
                        ? 'bg-blue-50 border-blue-200' 
                        : rank <= 3 
                          ? 'bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-50 to-gray-100 border-gray-200'
                          : 'bg-white border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-50'
                    }`}
                  >
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
                      <div className={`w-12 h-12 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center ${getRankBadge(rank)}`}>
                        {getRankIcon(rank)}
                      </div>
                      
                      <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                        <div className="w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-gray-200 flex items-center justify-center">
                          <User className="h-5 w-5 text-gray-600" />
                        </div>
                        <div>
                          <p className={`font-semibold ${isCurrentUser ? 'text-blue-900' : 'text-gray-900'}`}>
                            {entry.name}
                            {isCurrentUser && (
                              <Badge variant="secondary" className="ml-2 bg-blue-100 text-blue-800">
                                You
                              </Badge>
                            )}
                          </p>
                          <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
                            {entry.attempts} test{entry.attempts !== 1 ? 's' : ''} completed
                          </p>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="text-right">
                      <div className={`text-2xl font-bold ${
                        entry.avg_score >= 90 
                          ? 'text-green-600' 
                          : entry.avg_score >= 70 
                            ? 'text-blue-600' 
                            : 'text-gray-600'
                      }`}>
                        {entry.avg_score}%
                      </div>
                      <p className="text-sm text-gray-500">avg score</p>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          ) : (
            <div className="text-center py-12">
              <Trophy className="h-16 w-16 text-gray-300 mx-auto mb-4" />
              <h3 className="text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">No rankings yet</h3>
              <p className="text-gray-500 mb-6">
                Be the first to appear on the leaderboard by taking some tests!
              </p>
            </div>
          )}
        </CardContent>
      </Card>

      {/* Achievement Badges */}
      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
        <Card className="text-center">
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <Crown className="h-12 w-12 text-yellow-500 mx-auto mb-4" />
            <h3 className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">Top Scorer</h3>
            <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
              Achieve the highest average score across all tests
            </p>
            <Badge variant="secondary" className="mt-2">
              90%+ Average
            </Badge>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        <Card className="text-center">
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <Medal className="h-12 w-12 text-gray-400 mx-auto mb-4" />
            <h3 className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">Consistent Learner</h3>
            <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
              Complete tests regularly and maintain steady progress
            </p>
            <Badge variant="secondary" className="mt-2">
              10+ Tests
            </Badge>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

        <Card className="text-center">
          <CardContent className="p-6">
            <Award className="h-12 w-12 text-orange-500 mx-auto mb-4" />
            <h3 className="font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">Subject Master</h3>
            <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">
              Excel in multiple programming topics and concepts
            </p>
            <Badge variant="secondary" className="mt-2">
              3+ Topics
            </Badge>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>
      </div>

      {/* Motivational Message */}
      <Card className="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-50 to-purple-50 border-blue-200">
        <CardContent className="p-6 text-center">
          <h3 className="text-xl font-bold text-blue-900 mb-2">
            Keep Learning, Keep Growing! ðŸš€
          </h3>
          <p className="text-blue-700 mb-4">
            Every test you take brings you closer to mastering programming concepts.
            Challenge yourself and climb the leaderboard!
          </p>
          <div className="flex justify-center gap-4 text-sm">
            <div className="text-blue-800">
              <span className="font-semibold">Tip:</span> Focus on understanding concepts, not just scores
            </div>
          </div>
        </CardContent>
      </Card>
    </div>
  );

import React from 'react';
import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { Separator } from '@/components/ui/separator';
import { useLoadAction } from '@uibakery/data';
import { 
  User,
  Mail,
  Calendar,
  Target,
  TrendingUp,
  Award,
  BookOpen,
  Settings,
  Download
} from 'lucide-react';
import getUserAttempts from '@/actions/getUserAttempts';

interface ProfileProps {
  user: { id: number; name: string; email?: string };
}

export default function Profile({ user }: ProfileProps) {
  const [attempts] = useLoadAction(getUserAttempts, [], { userId: user.id });

  const profileStats = React.useMemo(() => {
    if (!attempts || attempts.length === 0) {
      return {
        totalTests: 0,
        averageScore: 0,
        bestScore: 0,
        topicsMastered: 0,
        joinDate: 'January 2024',
        lastActivity: 'Never'
      };
    }

    const scores = attempts.map((a: any) => a.score);
    const totalScore = scores.reduce((a: number, b: number) => a + b, 0);
    const uniqueTopics = new Set(attempts.map((a: any) => a.topic));
    const lastAttempt = attempts[0];
    
    return {
      totalTests: attempts.length,
      averageScore: Math.round(totalScore / attempts.length),
      bestScore: Math.round(Math.max(...scores)),
      topicsMastered: uniqueTopics.size,
      joinDate: 'January 2024', // Mock data
      lastActivity: new Date(lastAttempt.created_at).toLocaleDateString()
    };
  }, [attempts]);

  const badges = [
    { name: 'First Test', description: 'Completed your first test', earned: profileStats.totalTests > 0 },
    { name: 'High Scorer', description: 'Scored 90% or higher', earned: profileStats.bestScore >= 90 },
    { name: 'Consistent Learner', description: 'Completed 5+ tests', earned: profileStats.totalTests >= 5 },
    { name: 'Multi-Topic', description: 'Learned 3+ topics', earned: profileStats.topicsMastered >= 3 },
  ];

  const downloadProgressReport =
    () => {
    // Mock function - in real app, this would generate and download a PDF report
    alert('Progress report download would start here!');
  };

  return (
    <div className="space-y-6">
      {/* Header */}
      <div>
        <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2">Profile</h1>
        <p className="text-gray-600">Manage your account and view your learning achievements</p>
      </div>

      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
        {/* Profile Info */}
        <div className="lg:col-span-1">
          <Card>
            <CardHeader className="text-center">
              <div className="w-24 h-24 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-400 to-purple-500 flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4">
                <User className="h-12 w-12 text-white" />
              </div>
              <CardTitle className="text-xl">{user.name}</CardTitle>
              <CardDescription className="flex items-center justify-center gap-1">
                <Mail className="h-4 w-4" />
                {user.email || 'No email provided'}
              </CardDescription>
            </CardHeader>
            <CardContent>
              <div className="space-y-4">
                <div className="flex items-center gap-3 text-sm">
                  <Calendar className="h-4 w-4 text-gray-500" />
                  <span>Joined {profileStats.joinDate}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="flex items-center gap-3 text-sm">
                  <TrendingUp className="h-4 w-4 text-gray-500" />
                  <span>Last active {profileStats.lastActivity}</span>
                </div>
                
                <Separator />
                
                <div className="text-center">
                  <Badge variant="secondary" className="bg-blue-100 text-blue-800">
                    Learning Level: Beginner
                  </Badge>
                </div>
              </div>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>

          {/* Quick Actions */}
          <Card className="mt-6">
            <CardHeader>
              <CardTitle className="text-lg">Quick Actions</CardTitle>
            </CardHeader>
            <CardContent className="space-y-3">
              <Button variant="outline" className="w-full justify-start">
                <Settings className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
                Account Settings
              </Button>
              <Button variant="outline" className="w-full justify-start" onClick={downloadProgressReport}>
                <Download className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
                Download Progress Report
              </Button>
            </CardContent>

        </div>

              <CardDescription>Your learning journey by the numbers</CardDescription>
            </CardHeader>
            <CardContent>

                <div className="text-center">

                    <Target className="h-8 w-8 text-blue-600" />
                  </div>
                  <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{profileStats.totalTests}</p>

                  <p className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900">{profileStats.topicsMastered}</p>
                  <p className="text-sm text-gray-600">Topics Studied</p>
                </div>
              </div>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>

          {/* Badges & Achievements */}
          <Card>
            <CardHeader>
              <CardTitle>Achievements & Badges</CardTitle>
              <CardDescription>Your learning milestones and accomplishments</CardDescription>
            </CardHeader>
            <CardContent>
              <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
                {badges.map((badge, index) => (
                  <div
                    key={index}
                    className={`p-4 rounded-lg border-2 flex items-center gap-3 ${
                      badge.earned 
                        ? 'bg-green-50 border-green-200' 
                        : 'bg-gray-50 border-gray-200'
                    }`}
                  >
                    <div className={`w-12 h-12 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center ${
                      badge.earned ? 'bg-green-100' : 'bg-gray-100'

                      <Award className={`h-6 w-6 ${
                        badge.earned ? 'text-green-600' : 'text-gray-400'
                      }`} />
                    </div>
                    <div className="flex-1">
                      <p className={`font-medium ${
                        badge.earned ? 'text-green-900' : 'text-gray-500'
                      }`}>
                        {badge.name}
                      </p>
                      <p className={`text-sm ${
                        badge.earned ? 'text-green-700' : 'text-gray-400'
                      }`}>
                        {badge.description}
                      </p>
                    </div>
                    {badge.earned && (
                      <Badge variant="secondary" className="bg-green-100 text-green-800">
                        Earned
                      </Badge>
                    )}
                  </div>
                ))}
              </div>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>

          {/* Learning Goals */}
          <Card>
            <CardHeader>
              <CardTitle>Learning Goals</CardTitle>
              <CardDescription>Set targets for your continuous improvement</CardDescription>
            </CardHeader>
            <CardContent>
              <div className="space-y-4">
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between p-3 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg">
                  <div>
                    <p className="font-medium text-blue-900">Complete 10 Tests</p>
                    <p className="text-sm text-blue-700">{profileStats.totalTests}/10 completed</p>
                  </div>
                  <Badge variant="secondary">
                    {Math.round((profileStats.totalTests / 10) * 100)}%
                  </Badge>
                </div>
                
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between p-3 bg-purple-50 rounded-lg">
                  <div>
                    <p className="font-medium text-purple-900">Master 3 Topics</p>
                    <p className="text-sm text-purple-700">{profileStats.topicsMastered}/3 topics</p>
                  </div>
                  <Badge variant="secondary">
                    {Math.round((profileStats.topicsMastered / 3) * 100)}%
                  </Badge>
                </div>
                
                <div className="flex items-center justify-between p-3 bg-green-50 rounded-lg">
                  <div>
                    <p className="font-medium text-green-900">Achieve 85% Average</p>
                    <p className="text-sm text-green-700">Current: {profileStats.averageScore}%</p>
                  </div>
                  <Badge variant="secondary">
                    {profileStats.averageScore >= 85 ? '100%' : Math.round((profileStats.averageScore / 85) * 100) + '%'}
                  </Badge>
                </div>
              </div>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

Git connection

Git connection allows you to persist your UI Bakery app in Git repository. Get all benefits of Git in UI Bakery:

  • Version control: track changes in your app and roll back to previous versions.
  • Collaboration: work on the same app with your team members.
  • Consistent development process: maintain the development process that is familiar to your team, including testing, code reviews, and deployment.
Pushing app to Git
  1. Create a new repository.

UI Bakery requires repository to be completely empty to connect.

  1. Copy SSH repo url and insert it into UI Bakery. You'll get a similar one:
git@github.com:user/fictional-octo-happiness.git

  1. Copy SSH key from UI Bakery and insert it into GitHub repository.

    • Open your repository settings and go to Deploy keys.
    • Click Add deploy key and paste the key.
    • Click Allow write access.
    • Click Add key.

  2. Press Push to Git & Connect button in UI Bakery. Now your GitHub repository is connected to UI Bakery.

Import app from Git
  1. Locate your app in GitHub and copy SSH repo url:
git@github.com:user/fictional-octo-happiness.git

  1. Copy SSH repo url and insert it into UI Bakery.

  2. Copy SSH key from UI Bakery and insert it into GitHub repository.

  • Open your repository settings and go to Deploy keys.
  • Click Add deploy key and paste the key.
  • Click Allow write access.
  • Click Add key.
  1. Press Pull from Git & Connect button in UI Bakery. Now your GitHub repository is connected to UI Bakery.

current app will be overwritten with the app from Git.

  • Custom scripts
Use external JS libraries 
xxxxxxxxxx
Custom code

The App Code tool enables you to add custom code to your app, including scripts, stylesheets, and HTML. These tags are added to the tag of the app. Here's an example:

<script>
  function myFunction() {
    alert('Hello World!');
  }
</script>

<style>
  .myClass {
    color: red;
  }
</style>
Scripts

To add custom scripts to your app, follow these steps:

  • Locate a library on a public JavaScript CDN, such as https://www.jsdelivr.com. Once you have found the library (e.g., https://www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/canvas-confetti), copy the provided JavaScript tag:
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/canvas-confetti@1.4.0/dist/confetti.browser.min.js"></script>
  • Paste the script tag into the App Code tool. You can add multiple scripts to your app.
  • Create a new Code action and call the new function:
confetti();

Note: when you delete a script, reload the app to remove it from the <head> tag.

Styles

To adjust the style of a component, you can use custom CSS to alter its appearance. Here's how:

  • Add a style tag to the App Code tool. You can add multiple styles to your app:
<style>
  .no-shadow nb-card {
    box-shadow: none;
  }

  .background-new nb-card-body {
    background: aquamarine;
  }
</style>
  • Use defined classes in your components in the Styles section of the component settings.

Note: when you delete a style, reload the app to remove it from the <head> tag.

Use Node packages In Automations 
xxxxxxxxxx
External Libraries

External libraries enhance the functionality of your UI Bakery app by allowing you to use additional JavaScript code. Take advantage of a vast ecosystem of JavaScript libraries to bring date manipulation, data parsing, and much more into your automations.

Finding Libraries

  1. Visit the npm website, the package manager for JavaScript and the world's largest software registry.

  2. Search for a package, for example "XML parsing" to find libraries tailored to your requirements.

  3. Select a library from the search results to view its details page.

  4. Locate the version number in the Versions tab. It is recommended to use the most recent stable version listed.

  5. Copy package name and version number from the Install tab and paste them as "package": "version" in the JSON packages configuration.

Using Libraries in Your Code

Use import statements to include the libraries in your automations:

import { parseString } from 'xml2js';

// Or use result of other steps, for example, HTTP request as const xml = {{data}}
const xml = `<note>
  <to>User</to>
  <from>Library</from>
  <heading>Reminder</heading>
  <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body>
</note>`;

return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
  parseString(xml, (err, result) => {
    if (err) {
      reject(err);
    } else {
      resolve(result);
    }
  });
});
